transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Good afternoon.
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, you saw that you called when the line was inactive. Now I am with you.
consumer: Hi
I am the mother of a teenager who will soon be 16. I really have no idea when it happened, I was exposed to it not long ago.
The girl shared with me that on one of the outings with another friend of hers (who today they are not in touch with because of me), they are today in her friend's apartment, and together with them was another guy who was a few years older than her (a soldier I think) and they drank, which is not normal in my opinion, and in the meantime that she was drunk he forced himself on her even though she told him she didn't want to, it didn't matter to him and he continued on his way.
consumer: Since then she has been on a journey of self-destruction, trying to fix the unpleasant experience she had, trying to look for someone Let him love her and in the process of course you fall for those who all they want is to use her body and throw her away afterwards.
agent: First of all, it's good that you contacted us, it's definitely difficult to experience this as a mother, to stand on the sidelines and not know what to do.
consumer: Exactly.
As much as I try to talk to her and explain to her that this is not the way, and that in this way she is only doing more damage to herself and more mistakes and in the end it will end badly.... She seems to hear me and promises that she will not repeat it, but every time it happens again, and I am the one who is there When it happens to pick up the pieces, to wrap with love, with lots of conversations, but nothing helps. And I already feel that in all this I am already sinking together with her...
consumer: Her father and I are divorced.
The girl is there Only with me in the last year and she hardly communicates with her father. We have 2 more children, one at 18.5 Ototo is enlisting and the other is going up to the 7th grade.
agent: You are describing a very natural situation of a victim who is unable to help herself and it is difficult for her to get help. Did you report it to any party? After all, she is a minor.
Consumer: No.
She does not want to.
She doesn't even know his name.
And she knows she doesn't have the mental strength to deal with it, with a legal process.
agent: I think it is very difficult for us as parents to help in these cases. Other therapeutic help is required here. As a mother, you are there to hug, love and be with her, but it is not a substitute for professional care. She went through something very traumatic and it is important to take care of her treatment. I can direct you to his place A. in which care is given to injured minors.
consumer: ok.
We live in Petah Tikva.
Is there something here too?
agent: I'm checking.
consumer: Thank you.
waiting
agent: There is the Lin center in Ramat Gan. This is a place that provides assistance to minor victims and their families. It is highly recommended to contact them. Mendes 5a, Ramat Gan
Phone- 03-6538440
consumer: Is contacting them by phone?
agent: It is important to note that throughout the entire process, from the moment of contact to the end of the treatment, there is complete confidentiality
Agent: Yes. Call and arrange with them. Very important, they will provide you with the required shell. It's hard to handle it alone.
consumer: ok.
Thank you.
I will talk about it with the girl.
After all, it is about her and I owe her cooperation.
Agent: H Yaveta has given her cooperation. Explain to her that it is discreet, that there are professionals there that is exactly their job and they will be able to assist her. Lack of care can lead to a snowball that will grow and grow and it's a shame she's young and has her whole life ahead of her.
agent: It's important that you also take care of yourself, I'm sure it's not easy for you either
consumer: You're right. 
This is my biggest fear, this snowball that will only grow and grow...
My concern is not for myself, I will face it, I will get through it, the main thing is that she will receive the right answer and help.
consumer: Thank you very much for the guidance and support. Not obvious at all.
agent: Sending you reinforcements from here, appreciate your concern and referral to us. Not obvious. Good luck and for any question and whenever you want to chat, we are Here
consumer: Thank you very much!!!
Agent: Please. Goodbye

consumer: Hi
agent: Hi, I'm with you
consumer: Hi
agent: How are you tonight?
consumer: difficult.
agent: Want to share a little about your feeling?
consumer: I'm in a really, really, really hard time
consumer: And I feel so alone
agent: You wrote 3 times actually, you feel that this is a different period, more than other periods
Consumer: Yes
consumer: unfortunately
agent: What makes the period different for you?
consumer: the intensity of the pain
agent: Where do you feel the pain the strongest?
consumer: I don't know
agent: But you know it's stronger than before
Consumer: Yes.
agent: And what do you do when it happens to you?
consumer: I have never had such a period
consumer: So I don't have an answer
agent: What concerns you, why have the strengths changed or what can you do with it
consumer: I'm in a bad mental state at the level of hospitalization (not suicidal)
consumer: I'm trying to enter a hospital alternative
consumer: This is my only hope
agent: It sounds like you know how to assess your situation and what is right for you now
consumer: Yes, but it doesn't help
agent: You say it's not enough
consumer: It's not enough because no one says they'll accept me as an alternative to hospitalization
consumer: And if they don't accept me, I'll go to a hospital, but I don't want to 
agent: So you're actually waiting right now, hoping for an alternative to hospitalization
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I have an intake on Monday
consumer: I pray that they accept me, I really don't want a hospital 
agent: Monday sounds good, it's really soon. You already were In such an intake already?
consumer: I was in a hospital alternative almost 3 years ago right after the sexual assault
consumer: I tried to log in again a year and 3 months ago and they didn't agree
consumer: So I'm so afraid that they won't agree again
consumer: They told me to come with a suitcase for a week because if I fit the treatment I can go in right away
consumer: And the suitcase thing stresses me out so much
Agent: Do you know why it wasn't agreed upon, what the conditions are, what they actually want to know about you
consumer: not agreed for some stupid reason
consumer: I meet their criteria
agent: So that's good... what about the suitcase
consumer: When they tell you to come with a suitcase - the very act of packing a suitcase, it puts you in a certain state of mind
consumer: come up to With a suitcase and in the end to receive no - I will not stand for it
agent: And that's actually their demand from you
agent: or the expectation
consumer: I didn't understand
consumer: I need to come with a suitcase. Yes.
consumer: I didn't have it neither when I was accepted nor when I was not accepted
agent: It sounds like a beginning, although sometimes you can think that the beginning happens from the moment of entering the intake. You are describing a situation where you have already started to think, to prepare, maybe that's why the suitcase feels like entering a state of mind
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I just need it so badly. really.
consumer: I'm so on edge
consumer: The mind already affects everything
consumer: nightmares at night and waking up, worsening of the physical pain I have
agent: The mind affects everything, it's Mao D. What you wrote is true. The mind can lead us here or there
agent: It sounds like you really want to come to Monday and stay there
consumer: I have to. It's literally life and death
agent: There are things that are important for you to say there at the intake
consumer: Just tell about the current situation
consumer: to transfer the distress
agent: is there also hope?
consumer: To say that I don't expect to be cured of complex post-traumatic stress disorder in 3-4 weeks, but that I really need a safe place to stop for a second, to rest for a second, to be wrapped and held, to think together about the option of continued treatment and to simply stop and breathe to get back on track with my life
agent: It's very reasonable, to hold the adversity alongside the hope and the desire to get back on track with your life
agent: We don't know what a basket is And to your smile
consumer: Consider?
agent: like such a balance, there is both from one side and from the other
consumer: eh..
consumer: Listen, it's the truth
agent: How will you know you are in the direction of your life path, what will be a good sign for you
consumer: I just need to gather strength, I need more intensive treatment for a few weeks, more wrapping
agent: And what will tell you that you are on the right path?
consumer: first of all go in there.
agent: So packing a suitcase sounds like the beginning of this beginning, maybe that's why it's hard
consumer: I started packing
agent: You wrote right at the beginning that it puts you in a state of mind, you're great for starting
consumer: yes ..

consumer: יום שישי ?
consumer: פיטרו אותי לא בחוק ב 24 אפריל בגלל טיפולי DBT 
בית עינבל אני חודשיים עכשיו חזרתי לשירות לאומי 
הרכזת היתעללה בי ניכנסה לפסיכיאטרית בלי רשות ביקשה דוח כשרות פסיכיאטרית
היו שואלים אותי כמה נאנסתי ביום שירות טראומאטי בה״ח ברזילי אגב שם אושפזתי במחלקה פסיכיאטרית אהל הטראומה היא מהשירות לאומי שם באורולוגיה
האחות אחראית הייתה שואלת כמה נאנסתי ביום
אחוזי נכות וכו 
גם את האישפוז הייתי בו אחרי האונס בלעתי 100 כדורים  הייתי 3 חודשים  
פשוט נוראי
מדינה ישראל רצחה אותי הפכתי לחולה על ידי אנשים מטעם המדינה כמו משרד החינוך רצחו אותי 
היחידי האדם הפרטי פגע בי זה הידיד האנס חוץ ממנו כולם עובדי מדינה
מספיק יש לי פוסט טראומה מורכבת הפרעת אישיות גבולית הפרעות אכילה (בולמיה אנורקסיה ) 
והפרעת חרדה 
עכשיו ocd קל אבל עדיין קשה לי
אני בהמתנה לאישפוז יום לניפגעות תקיפה מינית אבל אני יתחיל אחרי שירות לאומי
החלום שלי זה להיות מעצבת פנים לפני רציתי להיות אחות אחרי מה שעברתי כוח עזר בת שירות לאומי ברזילי ירד לי החשק
כן למרות באישפוז פסיכיאטרי עזרתי המון לאחיות בהיתנדבות בתור מאושפזת אבל זה לא אותו דבר כמו עובדת שם
הרכזת ניכנסה לפסיכיאטרית שלי בלי רישות נהיה לי חרדות קשות ocd אובחן לאחרונה הפרעת חרדה באישפוז
כן זה אסור על פי חוק היא איימה שאם לא יתן לה להיכנס היא תפטר אותי אז לא הייתה ברירה להסכים גם אם הסכמתי חייב הסכם וויתור סודיות גם לפסיכיאטרית אסור להכניס בנאדם זר במיוחד רכזת
אפילו עוסית מבקשת אישור רישות לפני שהיא פונה לפסיכיאטר/ית
לראות פלאשבקים מהתיכון ועד עכשיו כולל האונס האישפוז מרגישה סרט מהגיהנום איזה מוות 
 העונש שליי ניכנסתי לברזילי לקנות קפה כי במקרה אחותי אמא שליי הייתה שם לבדיקה זה גרם פשוט לפלאשבק עוד יותר אין ספק שזה רע לי להיכנס לברזילי

Beit Einbal I've been back in national service for two months now

The nurse in charge would ask how many times I was raped per day
Disability percentages etc

Just terrible
The state of Israel murdered me. I became ill by people on behalf of the state, such as the Ministry of Education. They murdered me 
The only private person who hurt me was my friend, the rapist Of whom all are civil servants
Enough, I have complex post-traumatic stress disorder, borderline personality disorder, eating disorders (bulimia, anorexia) 
and anxiety disorder 
Now ocd is easy but still hard for me
I am waiting for day hospitalization for victims of sexual assault, but I will start after national service
My dream is to be an interior designer. Before I wanted to be a nurse. After what I went through, I lost my desire to be a Barzilai national service auxiliary force.
Yes, although in a psychiatric hospital, I helped the nurses a lot by volunteering as an inpatient, but it's not the same as working there
The coordinator went into my psychiatrist's office without permission, I got severe anxiety, ocd, I was recently diagnosed with anxiety disorder in the hospital
Yes, it's not allowed by law. She threatened that if I don't let her in, she'll fire me, so no I had the choice to agree, even if I agreed, an agreement and confidentiality waiver was required even for the psychiatrist. It is forbidden to bring in a stranger, especially a coordinator
Even a woman asks for permission from a religious authority before she goes to see a psychiatrist

consumers: 37

consumer: unfortunately not. I am struggling and living on psychiatric drugs.  Living on a disability pension only.

consumer: Blessed is she really surrounded.

Difficult investigations? distrust?..

The testimony can be long and it is important to give exact details and not to hide anything even if it is unpleasant and if you are ashamed, even if you are not pretty, it may to appear later that you did not tell the truth or that you are hiding information

agent: You don't need a lawyer to file a complaint, and to include giving your testimony, when your testimony ends, you receive a permit from the police and a code with a password to continue to find out the status of your complaint. The offender will be summoned for questioning and then both of you will be summoned to a confrontation. You sit in the police station together and you describe what happened and blame him. It is not easy but important.
agent: It's a long process, I can't say exactly how much, and sometimes it's painful and frustrating

agent: the will and goldsmith

agent: take it out,

agent: unfortunately this is also true, it may end like this, it is good to remember why you want to file a complaint and that this understanding will accompany you

agent: at your pace, I meant,

consumer: Hi
agent: Hello, I'm here for you
consumer: Hello, thank you very much
consumer: I was sexually harassed at my job four years ago, in the last few days it has come back to me and I feel that that person should be punished and pay for what he did to me and also my employers that I am angry with them as a result of this mainly taking advantage of my innocence
consumer: They didn't remove him from the workplace and I had to deal with anxiety attacks and panic at the thought of seeing him and also with actually seeing him during the shifts
consumer: Over time, I became very sick and had a hard time making it to shifts
consumer: A month and a half after the incident, I complained to my boss and the person responsible for sexual harassment in the company, I did not receive a copy of the report from her And not the security footage that was on the scene.. Today it's been four years and I don't know if these footage still exist 
And I feel inside that I owe them so that I can promote something with it
agent: I'm sure you're dealing with a difficult situation, and you also feel powerless in front of the workplace.
consumer: Two days ago I was up all night and I was in the middle of collecting evidence from WhatsApp from this period
consumer: I am very afraid of the process of filing a complaint with the police, I feel that in advance my chances are zero and the chance that they will trample me during the process is so high and I don't want to risk it
consumer: But on the other hand they have to pay
consumer: anyone who was related to it
agent: because my shift is standing To finish in a few more minutes, I suggest you continue the conversation with the assistant who starts the shift at 20:00
consumer: Anyone who didn't care about me as an innocent 19-year-old girl who doesn't know how to handle something like this
consumer: ok thank you good evening

Hey
hi hello thank you very much
I was sexually harassed at my job four years ago, in the last few days it has come to my mind again and I feel that that person should be punished and pay for what he did to me and also my employers that I am angry with them as a result of this mainly taking advantage of my innocence
They didn't keep him away from the workplace and I had to deal with anxiety attacks and panic at the thought of seeing him and also with actually seeing him during the shifts
Over time I became very sick and had a hard time coming to shifts
A month and a half after the incident, I complained to my boss who is responsible for sexual harassment in the company, I did not receive a copy of the report from her nor the security footage that was on the scene.. Today it has been four years and I don't know if the footage These still exist 
And I feel inside that I owe them so that I can promote something with it
Two days ago I was up all night and I was in the middle of collecting evidence from WhatsApp from that time
I am very afraid of the process of filing a complaint with the police, I feel that in advance my chances are zero and the chance that they will trample me during the process is so high and I don't want to risk it
But on the other hand they have to pay
Everyone who had anything to do with it
Everyone who didn't worry about me as an innocent 19-year-old girl who doesn't know how to handle such a thing
ok thanks good evening

consumer: Hello and thank you 
I am Yael
I have to say for a second that I am overwhelmed just by the very concept of contacting an assistance center, despite the fact that I already know how to call the child by his name and I am being treated.
As another kind of recognition that contacting an assistance center is something that is relevant to me, and the truth is that until today I wanted to contact and it was difficult for me to do so. A little escape from the meanings of this label.
Thanks for making me feel comfortable saying that
I am currently applying because I am looking for help in finding a gynecologist with training in the treatment of victims of sexual assault, with warm recommendations, such that I will know that his/her space is safe and inclusive and attentive and respectful, and that I will be in full control of the course of things and especially the physical examination
Currently looking in the central area, but ready to start t to keep away
I feel that the crazy sensitivity of the subject is clear here in this space, and I still feel the need to say how much it is surrounded by anxiety and great overwhelm, to such an extent that it has resulted in the fact that I have been in need of gynecological counseling and examination for years and I have not been able to bring myself to it until today.
With blessings and prayers for physical and mental healing and a good and corrective experience of the kind that I work to believe exists in the world and insist on believing in the truth that it certainly exists
Thanks

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, I think I've been harassed for the second time and I don't know what to do
Consumer: Yes
Agent: Hi, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi, I don't know what to do
agent: You wrote that you think you were harassed a second time, would you like to share?
consumer: It was a late bus ride and there was a man there who got drunk, around the age of 35-40 maybe more, at some point he came to sit next to me and after a while he sat next to me and said a lot of things he grabbed my hand and tried to get closer every time.. I'm lucky it ended Thanks to someone who intervened and I moved to sit next to her, but mainly because this is the second time that happened to go out exactly 4 months after the first time, it strengthened and overwhelmed everything.. I keep thinking maybe it's my fault and why exactly it happened to me
agent: Many times in the case of harassment we feel guilty. It's a difficult and confusing feeling. In the end, the blame lies with the one who hurts and not with the victim
consumer: It just caused me a lot of confusion since then and discomfort in every situation, and strengthened a lot of other feelings for me and I don't even know how to tell this to my dad
agent: It sounds like you've been carrying this injury with you for a few months, it's very difficult, especially in front of people who are close to us
consumer: I happened to tell this to someone close but not to anyone in my family and I'm afraid that if I tell my father I don't know how he will react because I don't want to make him sad either
agent: You protect your father and that is understandable, but at the same time it is very important to share, especially the people Those close to us who can support us in such a difficult time
consumer: How can I start such a conversation?
agent: That's a good question. You have to remember that there is no shame here and it is not your fault that you got into the situation
consumer: right.. thanks 
agent: It is important that you know that we are always here for you, and your father is also welcome to contact us if he feels any difficulty. Many times we also receive inquiries from the immediate circle of the victims
consumer: Thank you very much 
agent: Thank you for contacting us, feel free to write again when you feel the need
consumer: Thank you

agent: Hi, I'm here now, listening.
agent: It sounds like you are on a long and difficult journey.
consumer: Yes, it is difficult and we are going to open a topic shortly
consumer: It's someone from the family
consumer: It doesn't come from you, does it?
consumer: anonymous
agent: very difficult. What will open the issue.
agent: It's anonymous and confidential
consumer: My parents are supposed to open it soon
consumer: Can you believe that's my sister
consumer: the big one
consumer: 4-5 years older than me
consumer: I am currently 18 years old
consumer: I feel like I can't live here or be here anymore, I feel hopeless
consumer: I've been home for almost a year and a half And sometimes she goes out
consumer: But I feel depressed, I smoke a lot
consumer: I really don't have the strength anymore
agent: Sounds like you're at the very bottom.
agent: It's not easy to reveal an injury, certainly not if it's not under your control
agent: what can help you?
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I thought I'd write her a long message today about it.
consumer: I can't anymore
consumer: Really
consumer: Really
agent: to your sister?
Consumer: Yes
agent: updating that I finish the shift in 10 minutes and then there will be assistants during the hours that WhatsApp is active.
consumer: I understood everything well
agent: what were you thinking of telling her?
consumer: A long message about everything, why am I like this for 3-4 years
consumer: It doesn't matter, I'll be fine, I feel a little anxious
Agent: I am I hear your anxiety
agent: A moment of exposure is a very, very, very difficult moment
agent: I'll be here with you in the next 10 minutes if you want
consumer: Yes, believe me, it's really hard
agent: It's not a long time, but we can continue.
consumer: I feel like I'm going to explode like this
consumer: Everything is fine, you are stunning
consumer: It's amazing that this is what you're doing
agent: It's very difficult. It's a really great analogy like before an explosion. Something was in there and now how did it come out. Once it comes out it is no longer under control like inside. And it's scary
agent: Thank you, it warms my heart
consumer: Yes, you never know what will happen
Agent: True
agent: What is important is your goal in exposure and what you want and what is important to you. You can also get to Ivy from an aid center. It is possible to talk by phone with 1202 and it is possible to leave a request for an assistance meeting and you can always write to us. you are not alone.
consumer: Thank you really
consumer: It's hard to talk to someone you don't know
consumer: or someone
Agent: Very true. Sometimes it's hard and sometimes it's easier because they don't know you and they don't judge you [
consumer: You're right
agent: What stops you from writing to your sister
agent: what are the considerations
consumer: I'm writing to her exactly, trying to word it well
consumer: She is currently with her friend according to my opinion
consumer: But my fear is that it will destroy a family even more
consumer: Even though it's already destroyed
agent: You say that in fact it is already destroyed. I also think that hurt is a rotten thing that gets used up Guilty. And as with vegetables and fruits, if there is something rotten it does not disappear, it affects the whole environment. When the time is right your insides are right - it can also do good to get the rotten part out. So is exposure when it's right for you and you've decided it's good for you.
agent: I'm finishing now, I wish you a lot of success and strengthen you. You are not alone, we are in the assistance center with you.
consumer: Thank you very much
Agent: Good night
consumer: Good night
consumer: Thank you very much

consumer: Yes, from Be'er Sheva
agent: I'll give them the details and they'll get back. Just write me your name and phone number! We here believe in you and strengthen you, you have courage in the struggle you have taken on
consumer: Mor Ben Yair 0524602108
Thank you, definitely not easy days
agent: Is there a sexual harassment officer at your workplace?
Consumer: Yes 
I underwent a procedure in front of her
at the end of which she sat opposite J 
And she claimed that the guy who was bothering me was an amazing guy
agent: It's really hard what you're going through, the lack of trust and the attempt to beautify and plaster is unbearable. Do you still work there?
consumer: I did not submit a letter of resignation
agent: Yes, it's really hard to continue working in a place like this. Do you have legal assistance in the field of labor law?
consumer: I hired a lawyer privately
agent: Excellent, you act impressively and powerfully, in the face of everything you are going through. I will pass on your details, hope they come back soon

consumer: Hi
agent: Hi, I'm Liat, I'm here with you now
consumer: Hi
agent: You are welcome to share with me a little about what brought you to contact us
consumer: At the age of nine I was raped and at the age of 14 I started having nightmares about that incident and now I'm 20 years old and I have nightmares and anxiety again and I don't know what to do my parents and family are trying to help but nothing can help anymore not even pills I've tried to kill myself a million times and I couldn't
consumer: And I feel that there is no point in life anymore
consumer: And I should commit suicide
consumer: I belong to Gaha and they don't want to accept me
consumer: I won't do it today
Agent: You are suffering a lot. Sometimes the pain is so great that you just want it to stop
consumer: true
consumers: What do you do in this situation?
agent: It's good that you contacted us, but I don't have magic solutions. You have a family that cares for you and you should continue to try mental or drug therapy. There are women who have gone through extremely difficult experiences like you and manage to come back to life
consumer: I take pills and they don't help, we changed pills and it still doesn't help 
agent: It's very frustrating but you should continue to consult with professionals
agent: I'm still here if you want to keep talking
consumer: I want to die, what do we do?
agent: When it's so hard, it's okay to think about death. But try to help everyone around you, doctors, therapists
consumer: What are you doing neighbors don't want me
consumer: And do I need hospitalization?
consumer: no question mark
Agent: I didn't understand who don't want you
consumer: Gaha
agent: There are certainly other hospitalization options
consumer: Really?
agent: I'm from the northern region and I don't know the hospitalization options in the center of the country. You can call 1202 and try to consult about other hospitalization options in your area
agent: where are you from in the country? If you would like to leave me details, I can request that they get back to you regarding hospitalization options

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
Consumer: Yes
consumer: what's going on?
agent: Good evening, I'm here now
consumer: Hi, how are you?
consumer: I speak for my sister
consumer: She was raped unfortunately and I am looking for a place/psychologist for mental support
consumer: in face-to-face conversations once a week or once every two weeks
agent: Hi, first of all it is important for me to reflect that your sister is lucky that you are taking care of her. The fact that she shared her past rape with you indicates that she is probably able to trust you, which is not obvious.
consumer: Thank you very much
Right now I know she needs someone to give mental help to know how to deal with all the crises that the rape brings with it over the years
consumer: That's why I'm turning to you
agent: The aid centers in Israel are divided into according to geographical space. Each center has a coordinator whose task is to help those who have been harmed, to find a therapist specializing in sexual abuse. You can dial 1202 and you will reach our volunteer. You can explain to her that you want to consult about treatment. You can also leave me your sister's name and phone number and from which area, and I will ask that they get back to you or her.
consumer: I'm from Ashkelon
consumer: I'd rather they talk to me first
consumer: 0526614505
consumer: I would be happy if they get back to me as soon as possible
Agent: What's your name?
agent: And from which region is your sister? This is important because each sales coordinator handles a certain area.
consumer: Ashkelon too
consumer: My name is Dror
agent: perfectly fine. I will ask them to get back to you. If you need assistance and consultation, you are always welcome to use Well It is important for us to help everyone who supports the victims, it must be a difficult experience for you.
consumer: Yes, very difficult
Thank you
agent: I'm sorry for your sister who had to go through such a difficult experience and for you, that you have to experience the great difficulty she must have experienced.
consumer: Thank you very much, from here we will have to fight hard
Agent: That's right. You, and maybe those who are by her side in addition to her, are also entitled to support. Amor, allow yourselves, if necessary, to help us as well.
agent: I wish you and your sister to embark on a journey of healing. They will get back to you in the next few days. The assistance center of the lowland region is located in Rehovot.
consumer: Thank you very much

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, you contacted us in the morning. I'm here now, if you want.
consumer: Hello
Agent: Hello
consumer: What is the format here actually?
consumer: someone gave me your number
consumer: But I have no idea beyond that
agent: We are a helpline for victims of sexual assault. You can share difficulties, consult, and whatever you need.
Consumer: Oh
consumer: ok
consumer: anonymous and this?
agent: Unfortunately, the WhatsApp line is not anonymous. The usual helplines - 1202, yes anonymous. Here I can see the phone number from which the call came and sometimes the name. We don't see your profile picture. It is important to emphasize that we are committed to maintaining confidentiality, therefore the details are Your phone number and the details of the conversation will remain confidential (except in cases of harming minors and the helpless in which there is an obligation to report to the authorities in accordance with the law)
consumer: So there is no anonymity but there is confidentiality
Agent: That's right. The intention is that if we know the full name of the victim and she is a minor who was harmed by a person who is supposed to be responsible for her, we will have to assist and connect an external professional, if this is a case that requires mediation by a professional agency such as a social worker. As long as we don't know the personal details, we can give anonymous and discreet assistance.
consumer: I'm not a minor
consumer: So basically, with me, in any case, everything stays here
Agent: Very true. We are only here to provide assistance. If you are not a minor - then everything will also remain within the framework of the Si center and anonymously and discreetly.
consumer: The person who gave me your number told me that actually if they touched me or invaded my privacy without my consent, it is considered sexual assault, even if the other party had no sexual intention and they only wanted to harass me
consumer: is she right?
consumer: Because according to that I was sexually assaulted, but to call it sexual assault is just to inflate the story
agent: Your friend is quite right unfortunately.. the intention is not what is decisive. The question - what was the result, and above all - how did you feel. If you have had an experience of invasion and harm, then as far as we are concerned, you are harmed. There is of course a difference between legal definitions and the emotional and mental perception of the experience of sexual abuse.
consumer: So I was hurt
consumer: She also claims that this is why I do Today what I am doing.. what is called seems to me to be unhealthy sexual activity
consumer: She says that subconsciously - I'm trying to take control back into my hands
agent: First of all, I'm sorry to hear that someone allowed themselves to do things without your permission and without your consent. It must leave uneasy feelings in the soul, and it may be that as a result of this injury, there are unhealthy behaviors, it happens many times. Sort of trying to repair the damage - which only causes more damage.
consumer: And is this a direct and close relationship?
consumer: I mean, there's no way I'll be able to heal myself and stop doing this nonsense even without opening up what they did or didn't do to me?
agent: In order to understand your particular case, the best thing to do is to do Psalms One-on-one with a therapist who is an expert in the field of sexual abuse. In such a professional process, you can slowly understand what is going on in your mind, and understand what is related to what. This is also the best way we know to succeed in making a journey of healing that frees from the consequences of the injury.
consumer: I already have an emotional therapist
consumer: I don't think she is an expert in the field of sexual abuse
consumer: Do I need another nanny now?
agent: If you are already in treatment, it is worth sharing with the therapist the harm and the unhealthy sexual behaviors. Maybe she can work with you on it. If not, you can ask her for a recommendation for a therapist who specializes in sexual injuries. You will first have to go through the process of parting with this nanny, and then start a new treatment with Mo's nanny Mashed with sexual injuries. It is not possible to do 2 treatments at the same time. Even in the aid centers, they know how to recommend specialist nurses all over the country.
consumer: She knows about all my unhealthy sexual behavior
consumer: But I don't agree to talk to her about the injury
consumer: It's hard for me
agent: Telling about an injury you have experienced is one of the most difficult challenges. We have every reason not to share. When it remains a secret, it's small and we control it. The fear of sharing is that we will lose control, that we will be blamed, that we will once again feel powerless and uncaring for the environment. But on the other hand, if you share with someone who is sensitive, and knows that sexual abuse is never the fault of the victim, but always the responsibility of the abuser, then the reaction of such a person, including the caregiver, will be For her to be very strengthening and part of the healing process..
consumer: I don't want to
consumer: I don't know why, I just don't want to talk about it
agent: What's important is that you only do what you want. And everything only at your own pace.
agent: If it doesn't suit you to talk about the injury - then no.
consumer: Ugh
consumer: But then the hurt will forever continue to rule me
agent: You can keep in touch with us. Here it is anonymous assistance as you understood. That should make it easier. Because you're anonymous and it's not an ongoing relationship with someone you know.
consumer: good
consumer: And how does it actually work here?
consumer: Do you always remain the same? Or will someone else answer me every time I send a message here?
agent: Everything has its own rhythm. The fact that you manage to go In here, your thoughts, and the deliberations, shows that you are already in a process. But it is a process that takes time. It has to be cooked in it. And it sounds like you are attentive to both the concerns and the desire to overcome the consequences of the injury. It's really important that you pay attention to yourself. And at your own pace, do what suits you.
consumer: You're 70 years old and everything will be fine
agent: The volunteers here change. As part of the fact that this is a one-time assistance, each time with a different volunteer. And there is no feeling of dependence or obligation. If you want, you can always ask the volunteer to read what you wrote last time.
agent: You made me laugh about being 70... I'm guessing it was sarcasm....
consumer: When I was little my father would say that by the time the wedding it will pass, it's a shame that in this case hmm This sentence is no longer relevant
agent: By the way, you can always make an appointment at an assistance center in your area. If you want to share the injury with one of us. This is also an option. For some, it helps them release the difficulty of sharing.
consumer: Haha yes
And there was a typo there - I meant that by the age of 70 everything will be fine... if we go at my pace
consumer: Where is the assistance center? and how does it work?
agent: I imagined... humor is one of the most important medicines in life... :)
agent: I'm changing in two minutes. Would you like to continue receiving assistance from the volunteer who is replacing me or are you fine for now?
consumer: Haha, thank God that at least I was born with some medicine in hand
consumer: Um, I also have to leave for work in 5 minutes anyway
consu mer: Just answer me about the help center..
agent: where do you live? I will tell you what the assistance center is in your area
Agent: You don't answer and I have to change. The aid centers are scattered throughout the country. Every region has a center. If you dial 1202, you can reach the center in your area. consumer: Hi
agent: Hi, I'm here with you
consumer: Please help me
consumer: I'm not well at all 
And I don't know what to do
agent: It sounds like you are experiencing something really difficult right now, would you like to share a little?
consumer: I don't know what's happening to me
consumer: I'm a piece of shit
consumer: I can't stand myself
agent: It's not easy to have such feelings towards yourself
consumer: It's nothing more, I'm gentle with the words
consumer: I'm tired already
agent: It's really tiring to be flooded like this all the time, and must be very frustrating
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I don't have much energy anymore
agent: That sounds very exhausting
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I want to disappear
agent: escape from this harsh world
Consumer: Yes
agent: how a Can I make it a little easier for you today dear?
consumer: I don't know
agent: I am here with you in any case, even in the difficult feelings of uncertainty and despair
consumer: I don't know what's happening to me 
I don't feel well at all
agent: feeling a lack of control over your body
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I'm really scared
consumer: I can't even communicate with you
agent: It's really a very scary feeling
agent: Almost paralyzing
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I can barely even pick up the phone
consumer: Because my body is weak
consumer: I feel like I'm going to the point of disconnection
agent: So let's talk about the here and now
agent: can you tell me where you are right now?
consumer: In my house
agent: ok great God. are you sitting
Consumer: Yes
agent: on a chair or sofa?
consumer: sofa
consumer: do you want to help me?
agent: Can you describe the couch to me?
consumer: really but?
agent: I'm here with you, yes
consumer: What situation have I reached that I want to sell my body
consumer: Hospitalize me under duress
agent: It sounds like you're in a lot of pain, dear
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hospitalization is really something that can help, you can also contact your psychiatrist and be hospitalized with consent
consumer: no no
consumer: Hospitalization is the last place I want to go, but alone and with consent, absolutely not
consumer: Hospitalization is a traumatic place for me
consumer: I don't care anymore 
This is a show of hands
agent: It sounds like you went through some difficult things there
Consumer: Yes agent: I hear from you that you really want to be helped, that you want to feel relief
consumer: I don't know if there is anything that can help me
consumer: I know that even in hospitalization it won't help and I'll come back worse
agent: It takes a lot of strength to deal with such a feeling of helplessness
consumer: I have no strength at all
agent: You are tired and exhausted from carrying such heavy feelings for a long time
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I don't have anyone, I'm alone and lonely 
like a dog
agent: Loneliness is hard to deal with, especially with what you've been through. I really wish you find someone who will be able to ease this difficult situation for you
agent: because you deserve it very much
consumer: I don't have anyone
agent: It's really hard to feel alone
consumers: I don't care anymore
agent: I hear the great pain you are in, it can be very discouraging
consumer: Not interesting anymore
consumer: This is broken for me
agent: You sound very overwhelmed and I would like to make it even a little easier for you if possible
consumer: there is no god can help me in this situation
agent: You feel that you are in a place that no one can take you out of
consumer: Yes, as long as there isn't and won't be a drop of light
agent: It's hard to see the light when you're in a place of such great pain
consumer: I have never seen light in my life
agent: It sounds like you've lived a life with a lot of difficulty in it
consumer: It's better that you don't know
agent: I wish you a peaceful night my dear, the shift ends for today. We will be available tomorrow from 17:00

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, I'm interested for a friend who I know was sexually abused in high school for a while. He just finished high school this summer and it is very difficult for him to pass on many exams. Is there assistance from different organizations in determining psychotherapy and things like that?
agent: Good evening, I am here at your disposal
consumer: Good evening
consumer: I am interested for a friend who I know was sexually abused in high school for a while. He just finished high school this summer and it is very difficult for him to pass on many exams. Is there assistance from different organizations in determining psychotherapy and things like that?
agent: First of all, congratulations that you care about a friend and want to help him, and this is not an easy task. I recommend you go to the men's line, it seems to me that it is a more suitable place for you too And certainly for him. I will give you their details
consumer: Thank you
agent: The direct telephone number of the men's helpline is 03-5179179.
Their email is: Supervision@ta1202.org
There is also a helpline for anxious men. The phone number is 02-5328000
consumer: There is no option to chat with them on WhatsApp? I am located in New York at the moment
agent: possible by email.
consumer: Thank you
agent: and in the meantime, have a good evening
consumer: You too
transcriptConsumer_en:
Hi, I'm interested for a friend who I know was sexually abused in high school for a while. He just finished high school this summer and it is very difficult for him to pass on many exams. Is there assistance from different organizations in determining psychotherapy and things like that?
good evening

Thanks

transcriptAll:
consumer: שלום.אפשר להתייעץ?
consumer: כן
agent: ערב טוב, אני כאן לרשותך
consumer: תודה
consumer: אני לא יודעת איך לפעול מאוד מבולבלת
agent: בלבול זה מאוד לא פשוט. אני כאן לנסות לעזורלך
consumer: אפשר להקליט?
agent: מצטערת אין באפשרותי לשמוע הקלטה
consumer: טוב אז אנסה לנסח
אתמול באתי למישהו שאני מכירה תקופה...ידיד או סוג של מישהו שיצאתי איתו...היה בינינו אקט מיני בהסכמה (לא עד הסוף), אחר כך הלכנו לישון והרגשתי בנוח איתו ולידו. אחרי כמה זמן קמתי אחרי שעה או שעתיים כי הרגשתי מן קור בגב וגם אני חושבת שהרגשתי שהוא חיכך את איבר המין שלו בי (סליחה על התיאור). אחר כך התלבטתי אם להגיד לו או לא, החלטתי שכן..ואז אמרתי ושאלתי אם נגע בי בזמן שישנתי והוא אמר שלא..אני שכבתי לצידו והרגשתי לא בנוח ושאלתי שוב ואמר שלא ושזה נהיה קריפי..הלכתי לסלון והוא שאל מה איתי ואמרתי לו שאני הרגשתי שנגע בי ואמר שלא...הוא אמר שיקח אותי הביתה כי אין טעם שככה אשאר ואז בדרך עוד פעם אמר שלא היה כלום
 חזרתי בשוק הביתה שאני לא יודעת אם באמת הוא נגע בי בזמן שישנתי או שדמיינתי. אני יודעת שאסור לגעת באף אחת בזמן שינה אבל אני בעצמי לא בטוחה שזה קרה והוא ממשיך להכחיש! השאלה מה אני עושה במצב כזה ומה שהכי משגע אותי זה שאני בעצמי לא יודעת אם אני בטוחה במה שקרה...
agent: מאוד קשה להיות בבלבול כזה.
consumer: כן
consumer: מה עושים אבל?
זהו בזה נגמרת השיחה?
agent: את חושבת שאת יכולה לשוחח איתו שוב , אחרי כמה שעות כדי לנסות וללבן איתו מה באמת קרה? או שלדעתך אין טעם יותר כי כבר דיברתם?
consumer: אין טעם הוא כל הזמן בעמדה שהוא ישן ולא נגע בי
agent: או קיי, אם כך ,טבעי מאוד  להיות במצב של חוסר ודאות , וזה באמת מאוד מטלטל. יכול להיות שבימים הקרובים תביני יותר אם ומה קרה
consumer: אוקיי ובמידה ואבין שכן נגע בי האם אני מגישה תלונה במשטרה? אקבל ליווי? איך אני פועלת?
agent: אם תביני שהוא כן נגע בך, מציעה לך לפנות אלינו שוב ולחשוב על דרך פעולה. אינני יודעת אם תלונה במשטרה זו הפעולה הראשונה שכדאי לעשות,. בכל מקרה הייתי מציעה לך לפנות תחילה לטיפול נפשי גם כדי לברר  ולעבד את הסיטואציה.

consumer: Hello, I have a question 
I recently learned that my grandfather sexually assaulted many of the girls in the family and most of the adult grandchildren know about it and despite this, Tiyich doesn't talk to the little children about it that much and only makes sure that they are not near grandfather alone. What can/should I do with this information?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I am here at your disposal
consumer: Hello, I have a question 
I recently learned that my grandfather sexually assaulted many of the girls in the family and most of the adult grandchildren know about it and despite this, Tiyich doesn't talk to the little children about it that much and only makes sure that they are not near grandfather alone. What can/should I do with this information?
agent: Hi, it's very hard to hear such a thing mostly about grandfather How did you feel when you heard?
consumer: Terrible anger
consumer: both on him and on the adults who remain silent and continue to conduct themselves as usual
agent: It's really very infuriating, and shocking
agent: I would like to point out that my shift is about to end, would you like to chat/correspond with the next assistant?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Then the call will go to the next assistant. And in the meantime, have a good evening
consumer: Thank you
agent: Hi, I'm here with you
agent: It's not easy to find out something so terrible about someone in your family.
It sounds like it's important to you to take care of those in the family who can't take care of themselves, it's really not obvious
consumer: Yes, and my question is if I know that my parents are not doing enough to explain to my little sister and even if we talk to them How can I talk to her about it in an open way but without her getting anxious? (She will soon be 8)
agent: It's not an easy topic to deal with and talk about, even between adults and even more so with children. I recommend that you contact Beit Lin, an association that deals with sexual abuse of children. They also have a phone and can really help you with that
agent: https://beit-lin.efshar.org.il/
agent: This is their website, there are all the details about their centers throughout the country and contact methods
consumer: Thank you
agent: Good luck, we're here in any case if you want to talk, or if you feel like you didn't get an answer at Beit Lin
consumer: Thank you

שלום רב
היי, האמת שלא הייתי בטוח אם כדאי לכתוב. הייתי חניך בתנועת הנוער המחנות העולים, לה תנועת בוגרים עם תיאולוגיה שלמה (נכתב בנושא על דרור ישראל). נפגעתי שם בצורה די קשה ואחר כך היו תלונות על אותו אדם שכוסתחו, בכלל נראה שיש שם אנשים שחסינים.
הדבר הכי נורא הוא שבגלל השיוך הפמיניסטי שלהם כביכול, וההתנדבות שלהן במרכז הסיוע ועוד מקומות, אף אחד לא יאמין לגבר שיש שם בעיה ושהיא כוללת. לא יודע למה כתבתי מלכתחילה, אבל נראה שאם הייתי מתלונן על ארגון שלא מקבל חיבוק כזה מהארגונים הפמיניסטים, הנושא הזה היה נבדק
תוכן ההודעה הוא לא לצורך התנצחות, אלא כי באמת נראה שזה מאפשר להם לחמוק לאורך השנים. אף אחד לא יאמין לגבר (או לאישה שהתלוננה) כשאתה בעצם מלין על בכירות בתנועה שמקובלות במעגלים פמיניסטים ויכסתחו על מי שצריך כדי לשמר את המנגנון
מאוד אשמח ואעריך 
ירושלים
חילוני
אוקיי, תודה רבה
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
agent: Hello, good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi, the truth is I wasn't sure if I should write. I was an intern in the youth movement of the Olim camps, which has a graduate movement with a complete theology (wrote on the subject of Dror Israel). I was hurt there quite badly and then there were complaints about that person that were dismissed, in general it seems that there are people there who are immune.
The worst thing is that because of their supposed feminist association, and their volunteering at the aid center and other places, no one will believe the man that there is a problem there and that it is inclusive. I don't know why I wrote in the first place, but it seems that if I had complained about an organization that does not receive such a hug from the feminist organizations, this issue would have been looked into
consumer: The content of the message is not for argument and, but because it really seems that it allows them to slip away over the years. No one will believe the man (or the woman who complained) when you are actually complaining about senior women in the movement who are accepted in feminist circles and will bow down to whoever is needed to preserve the mechanism
agent: Thanks for sharing, sorry to hear you were seriously injured as a trainee. It is perfectly fine that you wrote and you can express your opinion, and write because you are concerned about what is happening there.
agent: You should contact the nearest assistance center with your words and thoughts. and talk to workers in the center itself. If you are interested, I will give you details according to your address.
consumer: I would be very happy and appreciate it 
agent: where do you live?
consumer: Jerusalem
agent: secular or religious?
consumer: secular
agent: phone- 02-6255558, tel And all call from tomorrow morning. OK?
consumer: Okay, thank you very much
Agent: With pleasure. good luck to you

I was hurt there quite badly and then there were complaints about that person that were dismissed, in general it seems that there are people there who are immune.
The worst thing is that because of their supposed feminist association, and their volunteering at the aid center and other places, no one will believe the man that there is a problem there and that it is inclusive. I don't know why I wrote in the first place, but it seems that if I had complained about an organization that does not receive such a hug from the feminist organizations, this issue would have been looked into
The content of the message is not for the sake of arguing, but because it really seems to allow them to slip away over the years. no one, no Believe the man (or the woman who complained) when you are actually complaining about senior women in the movement who are accepted in feminist circles and will bow down to whoever is needed to preserve the mechanism
I would be very happy and appreciate it 
Jerusalem
secular

I say in general

In general, seeing him after 4 months I had almost nothing to do with him
It will make it all really real
exactly
And I know him so well and on the other hand I have no idea what to expect from him either
And I have a very big feeling of guilt for everything that happened, though I know it's irrational and it's his fault
This is part of what scares me when I see him - that he also blames me, and it's so easy for me to blame myself
I'm afraid that he will manage to affect my self-worth like he once did
Yes, you are right, I also grew from this and learned a lot about myself and the world and I hope that I will be able to reach it strong and above all I hope that closing this circle will make me even stronger
I wish!
Thank you very much
Thank you very much I really appreciate it!

consumer: Hi, I would be happy for guidance and help then.
consumer: I am a woman who recently returned to prostitution, after almost 7 years of treatment. I am in a multidisciplinary treatment setting and receive assistance from the state, diagnosed and everything... I ran into financial and mental difficulties and that's how it happened that despite the treatment and everything I went back to prostitution. Treating myself to get out of there as soon as possible.
The help you ask is not for myself and a little more in a practical direction. 
My partner, with whom I have been in a relationship for 4 years, my return to this employment is very difficult. He himself suffers from undiagnosed depression, anxiety and post-traumatic stress disorder, and is not receiving treatment
And I feel that you treat him very harshly, unforgiving and patient, severe tantrums and guilt and anger. He hurt himself and I could only rage back.
We are Haifa , 
Poor without financial and family support. 
I remember in the past there were groups for spouses of sexually abused women...does it still exist?
What permanent therapeutic framework of conversations, free of charge, can I find for my partner before we both lose our sanity?
consumer: Thank you.
consumer: My partner got my job hard*
agent: Hello and welcome
agent: What a special woman who thinks of others first
agent: I will check if there are groups in Haifa for your partner. Do you think he will want to go?

agent: Then I'll check and get back to you
consumer: Thank you
agent: Do you agree that I give your phone to the hub in Haifa who can talk to you about all the options?
Consumer: Yes
Agent: Son Sef I hope you get all the help you need because you are in a difficult situation both regarding returning to your occupation and dealing with your partner, it must not be easy even for someone who radiates great strength and warmth

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
agent: Hello, I'm here for you
consumer: Hi, I wanted to ask
Agent: Please
consumer: I think I might have some sort of post-traumatic stress disorder, but I don't know and it's really confusing
consumer: Do you know what characterizes it?
consumer: One second I feel the worst in the world and the next I feel like I'm just exaggerating and that my reaction is just exaggerated
consumer: and a second after
consumer: I'm really confused, I can't function properly
agent: It's a difficult and confusing experience, which makes sense for it to interfere with your work.
Do you know that you have been traumatized in the past?
consumer: yes this year
consumer: I actually went through a therapeutic process with it until I got a little stronger and then I stopped it
consumer: And now I'm suddenly back to being bad
agent: Post-trauma can be characterized by flashbacks, triggers that make one feel as if they are right now, in the present, at the height of the traumatic situation
consumer: I scheduled psychological therapy and it scares me and I don't stop crying
consumer: And all this time I think I made it up and messed up and I just reacted like that because I'm weak
consumer: I'm already used to triggers
It is this confusion that breaks me
consumer: that I doubt myself
consumer: that I feel weak and guilty
agent: It's good that you scheduled treatment. I hope it makes you strong again. The very fact that you have prescribed treatment shows your inner strength.
Agent: Tell me how you feel
agent: Write to me, I want to help you
consumer: that I'm weak and guilty and don't believe in myself that much
co nsumer: And I'm trying to remember what it was really to understand and it's terribly confusing
consumer: What is the difference between emotion and feeling?
consumer: Every second I feel something different
consumer: I'm indifferent to everything, I'm sad all the time
consumer: I don't feel anything, I have a screen
agent: rely on your memory. The body remembers, certainly if the trauma was recent and also if a long time has passed and the trauma was not treated.
consumer: But it makes me feel weak and poor
consumer: And I'm afraid of myself
agent: It seems to me that emotion is more internal and feeling is something more tangible
consumer: I don't have the strength for it again
agent: It's hard to experience something difficult again. Do you want to share with me, maybe it will make it easier for you?
consumer: Someone abused me and he did something to me manipulations and it was very confusing
consumer: And I reacted really hard to it after a few days suddenly it erupted and I realized that something happened that was wrong
consumer: And there was a very difficult period with chamber attacks and dysfunction and I often had to ask friends for help
consumer: After about two months I was able to get stronger and function properly again and now I'm afraid to feel helpless again
consumer: And I can't do it alone
agent: You are describing a difficult time you went through and the fear that it will return is understandable. 
Is the person who abused you still in contact with you?
Consumer: No
consumer: He tried to contact me a few weeks later and I told him that I didn't want us to meet anymore and that he hurt me
consumer: and that's it since then
consumer: He was supposed to reach me For treatment the first time we met
agent: Great that you blocked him. Is the psychologist you agreed with an expert in sexual injuries?
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I don't know how to deal with it
consumer: What can I do?
Agent: Great. I really hope she helps you cope, because it's hard to overcome such a trauma alone.
What can distract your thoughts right now? What do you like to do?
consumer: I drink alcohol
consumer: It doesn't seem to me that this is the most worthwhile solution all the time
agent: I don't think this is a desirable solution either. How about listening to some good music? A good shower?
agent: Do you have a friend or family member that you share?
consumer: It just doesn't feel like it really helps me feel better
agent: I apologize A that we have to say goodbye, because my shift is over. I hope the treatment will help you and that you will be well again.
consumer: Thank you
agent: In the meantime, I recommend you find something that makes you feel good, like a movie, music, walking in the fresh air, etc.
You are always welcome to come back to us, when you feel the need.
I hope I was of help to you.
Good night

האמ וילדייה כפי שאתם יכולים לראות ללא ליווי או תמיכה או סיוע סוציאלי , כמו כן טיפול משטרת ישראל לא כראויה הוגשה תלונה נגד המשטרה מחוז בית שמש בכדי להתייחס לאירוע הזה בחומרת הדין ולא להסתיר את האירוע הזה וענישה , לא מעט למשטרה אין יכולת לטפל בנושאים כאלה והרבה נפגעות עבירה ללא טיפול
מבקש ממך באופן ישיר ליצור קשר בטל  054-481-0050 
דר דיצה ברקאי בשביל לקבל מידע נוסף שמלווה את האמ וילדייה ולנסות לעזור יחד עם המרכז שלכם למשפחה הזאת במצוקה
אין לי מושג פניתי במייל הראשי אל המרכז שלכם שהיה מצויין מחוז ירושלים וטלפון הווצאפ כמו כן , אשמח אם תוכלי להעביר גם את תטיפול הזה החריג האירוע *גילוי עריות במשפחה+פדופיליה* לגורמים הרלוונטים בכדי לקדם את הטיפול באמ וילדייה , כרגע הם נזרקים מי מרכזי חירום שאמורים לתת טיפול במקום לתת סיוע הם מזלזלים בעקבות דת , גזע לאום מדובר במשפחה חרדית והיכן האמ פונה למרכז לעזרה הוא חרדי ושם בצורה מושפלת נזרקת מי מקום למקום ללא שום מענה
כמו כן היום הגשתי תלונה במחש נגד תחנת משטרת בית שמש עפ הדוח הזה , פניתי גם לראש העיר והעירייה בית שמש להתעורר במיידי לצערי הרב הגורמים המקצוע ישנים
אני בעברי הייתי תחקרן בערוץ 12 בנושאים עבירות מין ברשתות חברתיות פדופיליה ועוד מגוון נושאים הקשורים לזה , בנוסף הקמתי לא מעט יחידות במשטרת ישראל באיתור מתבוללות באסלאם , ומסייע לשירות הבטחון הצבאי והבטחוני ישראלי , כעבור פרק זמן של עזבתי ממקצוע הזה שוב חזרתי אחרי תקופה לפעילות גדולה יותר בליווי כלי התקשורת השונים
כיום אני עוסק בתחום עבירות מין ברשתות החברתיות והפדופיליה , בעקבות שאני מוכר במוסדות השונים ובמערכת השונה מבקשים בעלי מקצוע את העזרה שלי ...

זה הרקע שלי שעסקתי בעבר וחזרתי כיום
המון תודה רבה לך לסיוע לא מובן מאליו אין ספק פה שמדובר באירוע רגיש ולא מעט מתגייסים למען המשפחה הזאת
כבוד הוא לי להעסוק בתחום הפלילים , כמו כן בבטחון הבני הנוער ובנות הנוער השונות ברחבי הארץ ולהקים יחידות המטפלות בעניינם בנפגעי העבירות המין , וכולל לתת מענה למשפחות העוברות פגיעה של ממש כמו *גילוי עריות* תודה לך בכול אופן על התייחסות ושנענת לפנייתי במיידי לא מובן מאליו באמת תודה , כמו כן תודה רבה שמרכז שלכם את באופן אישי מעבירה את הנושא האלה זה ממש לא מובן מאליו
אני מאוד אומר לך תודה בשם האמ וילדייה וכולם מי שמעורב בנושא , כי הנושא הוא מאוד חשוב עם הרבה סכנה גם לילדים והמשפחה הזאת חייבת לקבל ליווי בסיסי ביותר ובטחון קודם לטובת הילדים
מאוד מקווה בזכות עזרתך כמובן מקווה שעניינים יזוזו מאוד מקווה תודה לך גדולה ...

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, I previously applied to receive assistance for a company that was sexually assaulted about a year ago. I would be happy if you get back to me
consumer: Thank you
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: I am applying for a company that was sexually assaulted about a year ago. She tried meeting with a psychologist through Maccabi but feels she doesn't understand her. Trying to help her find a nanny through you so that she can enter into a framework of conversations. Yael came back to me and said that there was an appointment for a treatment program in Jerusalem because we live in Oranit, I wanted to know if it is possible to find an appointment for a treatment program through you in the central area
agent: I understand, since the answer on WhatsApp is national, I am in the northern region, is Ornit in the Tel Aviv region? Fresh? I can send you from s phone number that you should contact for clarifications,
consumer: Yes, near Rosh Ha'Ein, Tel Aviv and Ra'anana it's perfectly fine, also the Sharon area and every block of Dan if possible..
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Ra'anana is 09-7747760.
Their email is: withu@1202sharon.org.il
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Tel Aviv is 03-5176176.
Their email is: Supervision@ta1202.org
agent: I congratulate you for wanting to help your company, it's not always easy
consumer: Tell me about it
agent: How are you in communication with your company?
consumer: not easy.. not an easy burden.. to support. With us it is more complex in the aspect of the relationship between us
agent: It's really not easy, one of the important things is as And be non-judgmental and non-critical and allow your girlfriend to make the decisions herself, even if you understand that it is not accurate/not in rhythm/not understandable to you... Why is it important to allow her to regain control of her life, at her own pace and with her own powers.
consumer: That's exactly what I told her..she kept it in for a whole year and didn't tell me..and after a year of telling me, it took her a while to say that she was ready to take care of herself..I explained to her that there are no shortcuts to deal with it and it would be better for her to open the issue with a professional who understands In another area, she will have triggers in her life that will cause the subject to float in an unfavorable context for her.. the path to healing requires confronting the initial difficulty even if it hurts.. there are no shortcuts in the matter of the soul.. there is no end and end.. she will have to R number of stages until healing. Even if it brings down and hurts mentally.. later there will be growth out of the pain
agent: It's very beautiful and impressive and of course what you said is true, but it's also very difficult and we can't always listen to logic and say - well, I'm ready - it can take time. Good thing she knows you're there for her
consumers: 
agent: And it's also important that you keep your strength and you mentioned that it's complex.
consumer: Thanks for the reinforcements..I have yoga that helps and relaxes me
Agent: Excellent
agent: I wish you a quiet and peaceful night, and also strength to continue and you can always call to consult or ask or anything you need
consumer: Thanks for being willing to help, good to know. Good night
transcriptConsumer_en:
Hello, I previously applied to receive assistance for a friend who was sexually assaulted about a year ago. I would be happy if you get back to me
Thanks
I am applying for a friend who was sexually assaulted about a year ago. She tried meeting with a psychologist through Maccabi but feels she doesn't understand her. Trying to help her find a nanny through you so that she can enter into a framework of conversations. Yael came back to me and said that there was an appointment for a treatment program in Jerusalem because we live in Oranit, I wanted to know if it is possible to find an appointment for a treatment program through you in the central area
Yes, near Rosh Ha'Ein, Tel Aviv and Ra'anana it's perfectly fine, also the Sharon area and every block of Dan if possible..
tell me about it
Not easy.. not a light burden.. to support. With us it is more complex in the aspect of the relationship between us
That's exactly what he said Give it to her.. she kept it in for a whole year and didn't tell me.. and after a year of telling me it took her a while to say that she was ready to take care of herself.. I explained to her that there are no shortcuts to deal with it and it would be better for her to open the issue with a professional who understands the field otherwise she will have triggers In a life that will cause the issue to float in an unfavorable context for her..the path to healing requires confronting the initial difficulty even if it hurts..there are no shortcuts in the matter of the soul..there is no end and we are done..she will have to go through a number of stages until healing. Even if it brings down and hurts mentally.. later there will be growth out of the pain

Thanks for the reinforcements..I have yoga that helps and relaxes me
Thanks for the willingness to help, good to know. Good night

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Good evening
I need to share feelings
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: My name is Shay.
I have bad feelings and thoughts
agent: Good evening Shai, I'm just changing with another volunteer, she will continue with you soon, okay?
consumer: okay
So wait for her to get back to me?
agent: Yes, just a few minutes
consumer: good thanks
agent: Good evening Xi, I'm here now. I understand that you have bad thoughts and feelings.
consumer: Good evening.
Right.
In addition to dealing with the injury, I also have trauma from the army, and every time there is a difficult security situation, everything is shaken for me
agent: Sounds logical and so complex
consumer: It doesn't make sense to live like this
agent: It doesn't make sense to have traumatic experiences. and all the implications and their later life. But it makes sense that when there is a trigger like a tense security situation - it raises the military trauma
consumer: It's painful and difficult that it's like this
agent: I'm really sorry for you. Sounds so difficult.
consumer: Can I share something with you?
Agent: Sure. whatever helps you
consumer: Basically, I have been in a therapeutic setting for two and a half years, but I still haven't opened the story of the sexual abuse I went through.
In January, my nanny went on maternity leave and she doesn't return until September.
Does it make sense that I feel dependent on her and even a kind of motherly figure?
agent: I'm not an expert in the field. Yes, I know that the relationship with a therapist should become significant and even simulate a relationship with figures close to us. But it sounds like you are a very sensitive and aware person , therefore, if this is what you feel - it is probably true. I believe it would also be right to share with the nanny when you return. It must be important for the therapeutic process.
consumer: But is it okay to feel this way?
agent: sounds so human. and meaningful. A bond is created that reminds you of a bond with your mother. I hope this means that she feels like a figure who protects you and that you can trust her. This is what should happen in therapy. And the matter of dependence - this is part of a close relationship. Later on in the treatment, it also sounds like it's worth talking about.
agent: Shay, my shift ends now. Would you like to continue chatting with the next volunteer?
agent: I understand that you are currently not available. If you want - you can contact us when you can. Have a calm evening

consumer: Hi
agent: Hi, good evening

agent: how are you?

consumer: I haven't been able to stop eating for two weeks
consumer: I'm tired of myself
consumer: and this body
consumer: And from this world
agent: It sounds like a difficult time.. and your desperation is already very apparent
Consumer: Yes
agent: What is happening today specifically? or tonight?

consumer: ok
Agent: Good luck 
agent: Good evening, I'm here now. If you would like to continue the assistance, I would be happy to be with you
consumer: Hi
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I have an undiagnosed eating disorder though very active
consumer: And it makes me die
consumer: I gained so much weight
consumer: And I can't stop
agent: From what you know, was there anything recently that activated it?
consumer: There are always things
agent: It sounds so hard to be trapped in an eating disorder
consumer: It's an appendix to a lot of other things
agent: want to share? What things ?
consumer: There are too many
agent: I'm really sorry to hear that..
consumer: Everything is really unnecessary
agent: sounds painful.. what do you mean?
consumer: I have no strength to speak
agent: I'm here. Would you like to give yourself a break? Maybe relaxing music? Something you can only be. without effort...
consumer: Nothing will help me now
agent: It sounds like you're very dead It's hard right now
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I'm going to throw up
agent: I'm sorry for you dear, it's not fair that you have to suffer so much
consumer: I deserve it
agent: This is the most unfair. It's not enough that you suffer so much, for reasons you have nothing to do with, in addition to that you feel as if you deserve this suffering. No one and no one deserves such suffering. You deserve to be able to go through strengthening processes, and with all the difficulty, to believe that what you deserve is a good life and benevolent people around you...
consumer: a second
consumer: I will read soon
consumer: Wait
consumer: I'm washing my face for a moment
agent: perfectly fine. I'm here. I'll just mention that I'm here until eight. If you don't have time to answer, would you like to continue with the 20:00 volunteer? She will be here until 23:00
co nsumer: I think so
consumer: That's it
consumer: I don't agree with you
consumer: I don't deserve anything
agent: I believe you that's how you feel. And I can understand why you would feel that way. Maybe because we are looking for a reason for suffering. But I really believe that no one deserves to suffer. Life is full of experiences. Some are negative, some are positive. Everyone deserves to win a good life and benevolent women
consumer: I'm already tired
consumer: And I'm alone
agent: I believe that you at least deserve to help others. And thank you for helping us
agent: sounds really hard. and tiring.
agent: My shift ends now. Would you like to continue chatting with the volunteer who is replacing me?

consumer: Thank you
agent: Good evening, I'm the new assistant here

agent: how are you tonight?
consumer: Terrible
consumer: One second, I need water
agent: I'm here waiting
consumer: I'm back
agent: It's good that you drink, it's important

consumer: I want to sleep, I'm tired
agent: It is also important to wash your mouth and even brush your teeth, to clean the taste of the vomit. How do you feel after you vomit?

consumer: throwing up is so tiring
consumer: I'm hot
consumer: The air conditioner does not cool well
consumer: No way, I fixed it
agent: Vomiting can really be very tiring, but sometimes there is physical relief, and a real desire to go to sleep.

agent: You wanted to throw up, I understand right?

consumer: eating disorder
consumer: among others
agent: Does your eating disorder mean that you eat and then throw up?

consumer: can't stop eating
consumer: I usually don't throw up afterwards
consumer: sometimes yes
agent: Yes, it's called emotional eating,

agent: You are exhausted, both from the injury and its effects on you and what Heat I understand

consumer: Hi, I don't really know what to say or how to start talking
consumer: ok
agent: I'm with you now
consumer: Hi, thanks
consumer: I don't really know what to say
consumer: I mostly feel bad
agent: I'm listening, with you here
consumer: I feel taken advantage of
consumer: And I'm worth nothing
agent: hard feelings
Consumer: Yes
agent: feeling used is painful
consumer: true
consumer: I feel that I will never be loved because of my character
consumer: But my body is only what changes
agent: Oh, these are very debilitating feelings
consumer: Especially since nobody really cares
agent: These feelings are very much related to the feeling of exploitation
agent: And the feeling that you don't care is also difficult
con sumer: Ugh
consumer: I'm fed up already
agent: Maybe you want to share a little about yourself
consumer: I'm Maya
consumer: I'm 16 and a half years old
consumer: I finished 12th
consumer: Sorry, I'm done
agent: Hi Maya
consumer: And I was hurt a lot
consumer: in the last year and a half
consumer: sexually
agent: I'm very sorry that you were hurt
agent: sexually is everything
consumer: That's fine
I just don't know how to deal with it
agent: that is, sexual injury damages everything in the mind and body and probably therefore the feelings of exploitation
Consumer: Yes
agent: Did you share the vulnerability with someone?
consumer: close friends.. but they don't know about everything either and won't know how to contain it
Agent: Yes. It is hard to contain such a thing. also to whoever you hurt
agent: did you tell your parents?
Consumer: No
consumer: I can't
agent: It's really hard
consumer: It will do more harm than good
Agent: I understand
agent: Have you approached anyone other than your friends?
consumer: My guide from last year in the youth worker, and coordinator of the activity
agent: And they took care of it? Did you get referred?
consumer: But I feel like I'm losing them a little bit, we're not in such continuous contact as we used to be and I don't feel as comfortable talking to them all the time
consumer: I was directed to this number.. They spoke to me a few times and that's it
agent: I don't see a number...were you directed to an assistance center?
consumer: Oh yes, yes
consumer: I meant this chat
agent: I'm with you and want to help you get help
consumer: me I'm going to a psychologist but I don't feel like I can open up 100 percent and many times I feel like I'm shutting down and not cooperating
agent: It sounds like you don't completely trust her
consumer: true
consumer: I feel like I'm a lost cause
agent: I understand you didn't tell her about the injury
consumer: I told, that's the first thing I told her
consumer: I forced myself because I knew I needed help
consumer: But since I told, I don't feel comfortable talking about almost anything
agent: First of all, thank you for telling. It seems you really want to help yourself
consumer: Thank you
agent: sometimes therapists are not familiar with the subject of trauma after an injury and fail to help
agent: sometimes there is simply no connection to the nanny, and sometimes The pain and fear prevent us from trusting others
consumer: true
consumer: I understand what you are saying
agent: Is your therapist trauma oriented?
consumer: Not that I know of
agent: And you actually initiated the treatment?
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I dug my parents full
consumer: Because they didn't agree at first
agent: without them knowing that you were hurt
consumer: true
agent: There's a place called Beit Lin. Have you heard of the place?
Consumer: No
agent: do you want to go to Google for a moment to check?
consumer: I just read it
Agent: What do you think?
consumer: It's not so much for me
consumer: I don't want to make a big deal out of it either, I just want to feel good
agent: I understand you don't want to make an issue
Agent: Sometimes When we are hurt, it matters and causes us hard feelings
consumer: I don't know what to do
consumer: It's really hard for me
Agent: Yes. It's hard to be alone with this pain
agent: I'm with you here now
consumer: It's also hard for me to express what I feel
consumer: just a pain
consumer: and a feeling of self worthlessness
consumer: like a stone that just grows inside the stomach
consumer: distressed
agent: These are all hard feelings related to hurting you
consumer: I hate feeling like this so much
consumer: Like I'm going to explode in a second because I'm in pain
consumer: And I'm afraid to talk about it with people
consumer: and feel guilty that it happened to me
consumer: Because I could have been more careful
Agent: It's not your fault
Agent: You didn't want to be hurt
consumer: But I could have prevented it
agent: This pain becomes greater when it comes with guilt and you are not to blame for what happened to you
agent: You didn't choose to hurt
agent: someone chose to hurt you
consumer: Thank you for saying that
Hopefully someday I will also be able to think like that myself
agent: guilt accompanies vulnerability. And you are not to blame!
consumers: 
agent: I'm with you
agent: The shift is over and I'm saying goodbye to you. The WhatsApp line will be available again tomorrow starting at 17.00

consumer: התכתבנו אתמול, שאלתי בנוגע לקבוצת תמיכה רגילה באזור חיפה. אשמח לדעת מה קורה עם זה

נכון להיום  אין מקום פנוי לטיפול על ידי מתמחה, יפתחו עוד מקומות באוקטובר 23.

agent: המשמרת שלי מסתיימת עכשיו. כתבתי לרכזת את מה שדיברנו עליו וביקשתי שיבדקו לגבי תל אביב ויחזרו אליך. את מוזמנת לפנות אלינו מתי שתרצי גם בהמשך.
