transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
consumer: We corresponded yesterday, I asked about a regular support group in the Haifa area. I'd love to know what's going on with it
agent: Hi, my name is Zohar, I see that you are waiting for an answer regarding a support group in Haifa.
Consumer: Yes
agent: It is important to me that you know that, in general, participation in the group is conditional on receiving individual treatment and/or regular accompaniment by an attorney at the same time because content arises in the group that needs to be processed.
consumer: Yesterday I corresponded with someone on this WhatsApp, I told her briefly about my situation and she said it was complex
agent: According to what I check, there is no group that is going to open soon in Haifa
consumer: Moss from the local authority, or could it also be Moss from my framework?
agent: What can be done is to register you as interested and They will create with you when there is a time to start a group
agent: whatever you try is fine
consumer: Is there any individual therapy in the Haifa area or a group outside of Haifa?
agent: It might be possible to register for a group in Karmiel, could this be of interest to you?
agent: Another option is the possibility of receiving treatment at the assistance center by female students specializing in the field as part of a practicum. The treatment has a nominal cost of NIS 50 per session.
As of today there is no available place for treatment by an intern, more places will open on October 23.
consumer: Around October I should return to studies in Tel Aviv. Is there a group in Tel Aviv, so maybe I can combine it with my studies?
consumer: I study at Tel Aviv University
agent: I don't know how to answer that It. If it's okay with you, I'll leave a request for the hub to check and get back to you. It may take a few days
consumer: No problem. I would be happy if you don't forget me
agent: we will not forget. Sometimes due to a load of inquiries it takes a little longer. And even if we don't find something right away, you can sign up for the next group.
agent: My shift ends now. I wrote to the coordinator what we talked about and asked them to check about Tel Aviv and get back to you. You are welcome to contact us whenever you want in the future as well.

Yes

agent: assistance centers can both arrange a personal meeting and escorts, if you need and have difficulty walking alone (such as police, psychiatrist, social security, doctor)
agent: No, I don't have anything I can say that can help, but just talking can make it a little easier, even if only temporarily

agent: It sounds like you are in your pain and see that others don't understand it

It's strange that I haven't heard of you then until today..

agent: sometimes there are support groups in aid centers for victims (sometimes for spouses and sometimes for mothers of victims) and sometimes also treatment with specialists in the treatment of sexual abuse 
To find out details and also to try to schedule an escort to court - You can call 1202 (dialing the number will bring you to the nearest assistance center)

consumer: הייתי מעדיפה שיהיו לי חבלות על כל הגוף, שאני אדמם, שאני אהיה צרודה מצרחות, שאני לפחות אדע שנאבקתי ונלחמתי וצרחתי, ככה לפחות לא הייתי מאשימה את עצמי, לא הייתי שונאת את עצמי, לא הייתי רוצה לקלף לעצמי את העור בשביל להפסיק להרגיש אותו ולהריח את הבושם שלו.
אבל זה היה דייט, אני אפילו התרגשתי קצת, הוא היה נראה לי, חתיך , חמוד, טוב, מעניין, עמוק, מצחיק, הייתי בטוחה שיהיה לנו ערב כיף וזהו.
שהתנשקנו, והיד שלו לאט לאט נכנסה לי מתחת לשמלה לכיוון התחתון, עצרתי את הנשיקה אחזתי לו ביד ואמרתי לו ,לא, הוא הסתכל אליי ואמר לי שהכל בסדר, עם חיוך קטן כזה, ונישק לי את הצוואר, ושוב התנשקנו, הפעם הייתי זהירה יותר ופשוט עצרתי לו את היד, אבל הוא לא התייחס , והוא המשיך לנשק אותי ולהכניס את היד עוד עוד, אמרתי לו שאני ממש לא רוצה, נישק ךי את הצוואר שוב ובבת אחת הכניס את היד מתחת לתחתון, עצרתי , אמרתי לו שאני לא רוצה אבל לא היה עם מי לדבר, הוא חזק ממני בהרבה, וגדול ממני בהרבה(גם את זה לא ידעתי עד לרגע האחרון ממש) זזתי, זה כאב לי ולא רציתי, לא ככה, ואז הבנתי שזה כבר לא רק האצבעות שלו, ממש זזתי וניסיתי להתנגד אבל הוא הכאיב לי כל כך וכל פעם שהצלחתי קצת להשתחרר ממנו הוא תפס אותי במותן ודחף אותי בחוזקה עליו, אז שתקתי כי הבנתי שככל שאני אזוז יותר ואתנגד יותר זה יכאב לי יותר, שתקתי ונתתי לו, נתתי לו לנשק אותי , נתתי לו לכפות את עצמו עליי, פשוט ניתקתי את עצמי מהגוף שלי כדי לא להרגיש, ושתקתי-כמו מטומטמת, הייתי צריכה לצרוח ולבעןט בו, למה נתתי לווווו??????????? ואז הוא החזיר אותי הביתה, כאילו כלום לא קרה, ולא רק זה, הוא יצא מהרכב כדי להביא לי את הגקט מהתא מטען ונישק אותי, כאילו אנחנו סתם זוג שנפרד....
שכתבתי לו מה הוא חשב שהוא המשיך למרות שאמרתי לא, הוא כתב שאני סוטת מין ושכפיתי את עצמי עליו, ושכנראה מרוב עונג אמרתי לא, כאב ליי!!!!! עדיין כואב לי קצת, איך אתה יכול להגיד שנהניתי???? ואיך לעזאזל אני, אניייייי, יכולה לכפות את עצמי עליךךךךך???? איייךךךךך??? אתה מבין את הפערי כוחות שיש לנווו??? אתה גבוה ממני, חזק ממני וכבד ממני? איך בחורה במשקל 50 קילו יכולה לכפות את עצמה על גבר בן 36? איךךך?

consumer: היי, אז איך בעצם מתחילים לדבר על זה? 
זו פעם ראשונה שאני בכלל פותחת את הנושא הזה. מאוד קשה ולא רגיל לדבר על זה.
consumer: כבר עברנו את ההליך הראשוני
agent: הי, אני רות. אני איתך עכשיו.
consumer: היי, אז איך בעצם מתחילים לדבר על זה? 
זו פעם ראשונה שאני בכלל פותחת את הנושא הזה. מאוד קשה ולא רגיל לדבר על זה.
agent: זה באמת לא פשוט פעם ראשונה. את יכולה להתחיל מאיפה שנכון לך. אקשיב לך בכל דרך שתבחרי.
agent: אולי יהיה יותר קל לספר איך את מרגישה עכשיו
consumer: אז לפני 4 שנים כשהפכתי לאמא לראשונה, התחלתי לחיות בחרדות. על המון דברים, בין היתר כל הנושא של הטרדות מיניות ואונס. 
בהתחלה לא ייחסתי חשיבות למה שקרה לי בעבר, כי זה היה כלכך מזמן. אבל זה לא עזב, ורק החמיר כשגיליתי שתיהיה לי בת שניה. 
ואז באותה תקופה היה את האונס המזעזע ביישוב בדרום, כשאנסו ילדה בת 10 במיטה שלה כשההורים חדר ליד. 
והחרדות רק החמירו, החרדות האלו נוספו על מטען חרדות אחרות, וזה רק החמיר את המצב הנפשי שלי. 
בוודאות שאני גם סובלת מדיכאון כבר ארבע שנים, פשוט חייתי בהכחשה שהכל בסדר איתי. 
כל מקרה אונס, כל מקרה של הטרדות מיניות, מזעזע לי את הנפש. אני לא יכולה שלא להרגיש את מפלס החרדה עולה, והמחשבות שישר רצות לעבר מקומות אפלים. 
אז הסיפור שלי מתחיל בגיל 7, כשגבר זר החליט להטריד אותי מינית. לגעת בי, לנסות לחכך את איברו בשלי, ואז לאונן לי מול הפנים. 
אימי וסבתי ידעו, סיפרתי להן. אבל לא נעשה דבר. הן גם לא דיברו איתי על זה מעולם. 
וזהו, מאז אני סוחבת את זה איתי. 
בגיל 15 מישהי שמכיר אותי, ניצל את זה ששתיתי אלכוהול, והשכיב אותי. אני זוכרת שביקשתי שיפסיק ושאני לא רוצה ולא מוכנה, אבל לא היה מי שיקשיב לי באותו רגע. 
ואחרי זה, אחרי הפעם הראשונה, הרגשתי כאילו שוב חיללו אותי, ומשם זה עבר למצב בו אני מתרגשת מסקס ראשוני עם מישהו חדש. זה התחיל קצת לפני הצבא שהתחלתי להיות פרפרית ולרצות להיות כל פעם עם מישהו אחר. 
אז לא ייחסתי חשיבות באמת למה שאני עושה ובין מה שקרה לפני כן. 
רק כיום בדיעבד אני מבינה שהכל קשור. ושכל החיים סחבתי איתי מטען מאוד כבד, שעכשיו מתחיל להיות מעמסה ממש גדולה על הכתפיים שלי.
agent: נשמע מטען מאוד קשה לשאת אותו
consumer: אני נזכרת באילו סיטואציות מיניות הייתי כנערה, ואני מבינה שכל מה שקרה הוא לא תקין, ולא היה אמור לקרות אם הנפש שלי לא הייתה נפגעת בגיל כלכך צעיר. 
הייתי חסרת פחד וחסרת מעצורים בכל הקשור למין. 
אני גם כמעט ולא נקשרתי רגשית לאף אחד מהם. רובם המוחלט היו סתם, כמו כלי משחק עבורי.
agent: פגיעות בגיל כל כך צעיר משפיעות על החיים
consumer: עכשיו בגיל 31 אני מבינה את זה לצערי
agent: את מבינה שיש קשר בין הדברים
consumer: לא פתחתי את זה מול בעלי. 
אבל אני אצטרך לפתוח בהקדם, כי כבר תקופה שאני ממש נרתעת מזה שהוא נוגע בי סתם. 
התחלתי לכעוס עליו כשהוא עושה את זה  אבל לא להסביר לו למה. וזה היה יוצר סתם ריבים. 
אנחנו 8.5 שנים ביחד, מאיפה נפלתי עליו פתאום שאני לא רוצה מגע שלו?
consumer: ממישהי מאוד פתוחה מינית, הפכתי לאישה מאוד כבויה ולא מינית. 
לא רוצה כלום, רוצה לישון. לא רוצה שיגעו בי בשום צורה או דרך. 
בכללי התחלתי להירתע ממגע וחיבוקים של אחרים. ופעם זה היה חלק ממני.

consumer: בנוסף כשאני נמצאת עם הבנות שלי איפושהו, ועובר לידינו גבר, כל גבר, אני ישר גולשת למחשבות אפלות- שהוא וכל אחד שעובר לידינו יכול להיות מטרידן או אנס או פדופיל. 
אני מפחדת על הבנות שלי כשיגדלו. בעצם במציאות של היום זה יכול לקרות בכל גיל. 
מסתובבים בינינו אנשים חולים שלא שולטים על עצמם.
consumer: אני מחכה לתור לפסיכיאטר. ואחרי זה כמובן אצטרך טיפול רגשי, הבעיה שיש לא מעט רבדים רגשיים שצריך לטפל בהם. אני אפילו לא יודעת ממה להתחיל. 
הכל התחיל בילדות, וכמובן נשאר חקוק בזיכרוני. הפרצופים, השמות, והדברים שנעשו(לא קשור רק לפגיעה מינית)

consumer: So 4 years ago when I became a mother for the first time, I started living with anxiety. About a lot of things, including the whole issue of sexual harassment and rape. 
At first you did not attribute The importance of what happened to me in the past, because it was so long ago. But it didn't go away, and only got worse when I found out I was going to have a second daughter. 
Then at that time there was the shocking rape in a settlement in the south, when a 10-year-old girl was raped in her bed while the parents were in a room next door. 
And the anxieties only got worse, these anxieties were added on top of other anxieties, and it only worsened my mental state. 
For sure I have also been suffering from depression for four years now, I just lived in denial that everything was fine with me. 
Every case of rape, every case of sexual harassment, shocks my soul. I can't help but feel the anxiety level rising, and the thoughts run straight to dark places. 
So my story begins at the age of 7, when a strange man decided to sexually harass me. Touch me, try to rub a member And in mine, then masturbate in front of my face. 
My mother and grandmother knew, I told them. But nothing was done. They never talked to me about it either. 
And that's it, I've been carrying it with me ever since. 
At the age of 15, someone who knows me, took advantage of the fact that I drank alcohol, and laid me down. I remember asking him to stop and that I didn't want to and wasn't ready, but there was no one to listen to me at that moment. 
And after that, after the first time, I felt as if I had been violated again, and from there it moved to a situation where I am excited about initial sex with someone new. It started a little before the army when I started to be a butterfly and want to be with someone else every time. 
So I didn't really attach importance to what I was doing and what happened before. 
Only today in retrospect do I understand that everything is connected. and the whole of life I was carrying a very heavy load with me, which is now starting to be a really big burden on my shoulders.
agent: Sounds like a very difficult load to carry
consumer: I remember what sexual situations I was in as a girl, and I understand that everything that happened is not normal, and it shouldn't have happened if my soul hadn't been hurt at such a young age. 
I was fearless and unrestrained when it came to sex. 
I was also almost not emotionally attached to any of them. The vast majority of them were just, like toys for me.
agent: Injuries at such a young age affect life
consumer: Now at the age of 31 I understand it unfortunately
agent: You understand that there is a connection between the things
consumer: I didn't open it in front of my husband. 
But I'll have to open soon, because it's already time The fact that I really shy away from him touching me for nothing. 
I started to get angry with him when he does it but not to explain to him why. And it would just create fights. 
We have been together for 8.5 years, where did I suddenly fall for him that I don't want his touch?
consumer: From someone very open sexually, I became a very turned off and non-sexual woman. 
I don't want anything, I want to sleep. I don't want to be touched in any way or way. 
In general, I started shying away from touch and hugs from others. And it used to be a part of me.
agent: It sounds like you understand that damage from childhood and behavior from adolescence affects you today. Everything floats and rises. It also affects the ability to be intimate with your partner.
consumer: In addition, when I'm with my girls somewhere, and a man walks by us, Every man, I immediately go into dark thoughts - he and anyone who passes by can be a harasser or a rapist or a pedophile.

There are sick people walking among us who are not in control of themselves.
consumer: I'm waiting for an appointment with a psychiatrist. And after that, of course, I will need emotional therapy, the problem is that there are quite a few emotional layers that need to be addressed. I don't even know where to start. 
It all started in childhood, and of course remains etched in my memory. The faces, the names, and the things done (not only related to sexual abuse)

agent: You rallied your forces and asked for help.

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey, so how do you actually start talking about it? 
This is the first time I'm even opening this topic. It is very difficult and unusual to talk about it.
We have already passed the initial procedure
Hey, so how do you actually start talking about it? 
This is the first time I'm even opening this topic. It is very difficult and unusual to talk about it.
So 4 years ago when I became a mother for the first time, I started living with anxiety. About a lot of things, including the whole issue of sexual harassment and rape. 
At first I didn't attach importance to what happened to me in the past, because it was so long ago. But it didn't go away, and only got worse when I found out I was going to have a second daughter. 
Then at that time there was the shocking rape in a settlement in the south, when a 10-year-old girl was raped in her bed while the parents were in a room next door. 
And the anxieties only got worse, These anxieties were added to a load of other anxieties, and it only worsened my mental state. 
For sure I have also been suffering from depression for four years now, I just lived in denial that everything was fine with me. 
Every case of rape, every case of sexual harassment, shocks my soul. I can't help but feel the anxiety level rising, and the thoughts run straight to dark places. 
So my story begins at the age of 7, when a strange man decided to sexually harass me. touch me, try to rub his member on mine, then masturbate in front of my face. 
My mother and grandmother knew, I told them. But nothing was done. They never talked to me about it either. 
And that's it, I've been carrying it with me ever since. 
At the age of 15, someone who knows me, took advantage of the fact that I drank alcohol, and laid me down. I'm the one He knew that I asked him to stop and that I didn't want to and wasn't ready, but there was no one to listen to me at that moment. 
And after that, after the first time, I felt as if I had been violated again, and from there it moved to a situation where I am excited about initial sex with someone new. It started a little before the army when I started to be a butterfly and want to be with someone else every time. 
So I didn't really attach importance to what I was doing and what happened before. 
Only today in retrospect do I understand that everything is connected. And all my life I carried a very heavy load with me, which is now starting to be a really big burden on my shoulders.
I remember what sexual situations I was in as a teenager, and I understand that everything that happened was not normal, and it should not have happened if my psyche had not been damaged at such a young age Fire. 
I was fearless and unrestrained when it came to sex. 
I was also almost not emotionally attached to any of them. The vast majority of them were just, like toys for me.
Now at the age of 31, I unfortunately understand it
I didn't open it in front of my husband. 
But I'll have to open soon, because for a while now I've been really reluctant to have him touch me for nothing. 
I started to get angry with him when he does it but not to explain to him why. And it would just create fights. 
We have been together for 8.5 years, where did I suddenly fall for him that I don't want his touch?
From someone who was very open sexually, I became a very turned off and non-sexual woman. 
I don't want anything, I want to sleep. I don't want to be touched in any way or way. 
In general, I started shying away from touch and hugs from others. And once it was a part of me.
In addition, when I'm with my girls somewhere, and a man walks by us, any man, I immediately drift into dark thoughts - that he and anyone who walks by us can be a harasser or a rapist or a pedophile. 
I'm scared for my daughters when they grow up. Actually in today's reality it can happen at any age. 
There are sick people walking among us who are not in control of themselves.
I am waiting for an appointment with a psychiatrist. And after that, of course, I will need emotional therapy, the problem is that there are quite a few emotional layers that need to be addressed. I don't even know where to start. 
It all started in childhood, and of course remains etched in my memory. The faces, the names, and the things done (not only related to sexual abuse)
I am very aware today, although I know that it is better for the process to happen sometime late Than never. 
But I'm also afraid that this baggage I'm carrying with me has already emotionally damaged my daughters and my husband. 
The depression and anxiety don't allow me to be the mother I wanted and the woman I wanted to be. 
I'm like an emotionless robot. very angry I get very angry at the most devilish and silly things.
the smallest and stupidest*
And now that I want to take care of myself, the wait for each appointment is so long. And this only adds to the frustration and the physical and mental difficulty.
In addition to the one you talked about at the beginning of the conversation. 
I'm alone most of the week too. My husband is permanent, in a closed base. Sometimes it only comes out once a week. 
Right now he closes Shabbat. 
And we are far from the families. So I'm really really alone.
He is also in Nablus a lot on behalf of his new position at the time Haron Which increased all the anxieties.
Beit Maslan is in Be'er Sheva. 
And I have been donating clothes there for several years. Even before I became a mother. 
How ridiculous, that in the end I will turn to you for real help. It was always there in front of my eyes. The words below the sign, the meaning of the main boxes. 
I haven't addressed this before. And now it meets me in the most powerful way.
And how do you survive the wait between treatments?
And do you have frontal counseling? 
Do you have emotional therapists? 
Or is it all online only?
I'm from Be'er Sheva
Before I contacted you on WhatsApp, it turned out that I contacted an organization for sexually abused women, something else. There they told me that there is a waiting list of between one and two years - until receiving an initial frontal consultation. 
It's really sad to have to wait so long A lot of time. This is not a realistic time at all for treatment.

consumer: Hello,
A month and a half ago I experienced an assault / sexual harassment - mild -
It happened at the gym- 
in the sauna-
The attacker undressed and started masturbating in my presence. 
Although he stopped the act after I refused. 
But no apology or regret after conversation.
I am debating what to do about it. 
I would love to consult. 
Best regards,
Jonathan
agent: Hello Yonatan, I'm Liat, the situation you described is not an easy experience, it should not be underestimated
consumer: Thank you Liat- 
I'm still trying to figure out how to deal with what happened
consumer: A friend I shared made it clear to me that what happened to me was an assault and not harassment - then I decided to take action -
and at least consult
consumer: Why should you do it?
agent: It's good that you contacted us. It's a confusing situation, he stopped but didn't Take advantage and leave you with an unpleasant feeling
consumer: Although the attacker - presented himself as someone normative - and me as someone who sent him all the signs that would allow him to do what he did,
But in the end I felt he was manipulative - lacking any sense of remorse.
And I have no doubt that if it happened to me, it will happen to others who may find it more difficult to defend themselves.
consumer: I know the day and time it happened. It happened at a gym so they have surveillance and pictures of people
- I'm debating what to do.
consumer: Thanks for the assistance
agent: It's good that you were able to stand your ground in the face of his manipulation. You can of course contact the gym management, photos are usually not kept for long. Even if they didn't know for sure who he was, it could be that he was And previous complaints or there will be complaints in the future, and there is a meaning to such a request from you
consumer: And what about the police and the justice system? Is it right to file a police complaint?
consumer: Is a gym obliged to take such a complaint seriously?
consumer: They have a record of the phone numbers - of the subscribers who were on that day. The pictures are in the database
agent: The police won't be able to do much until they know who it is. You can try to find out at the gym who it is and then contact the police, or contact the police and hope they do this check in front of the gym
agent: I understood now that you don't mean surveillance cameras but pictures of the subscribers and who was there at the time
consumer: For me as a complainant - is the move worth it? am I Is it helpful to others? 
Also: 1. As a complainer at the gym
2. Complaint to the police
The answer should be different according to 1 and 2.
consumer: For me it's about revenge. Disconnection of the feeling of helplessness.
Restore respect.
And maybe a receipt of the unused subscription fees since I stopped going there. 
But is there a social/moral value to the complaint? A chance to prevent this for that person in the future?
agent: A complaint at the gym can lead to his removal from the gym (and to receive information for contacting the police). A complaint to the police is intended to lead to a criminal investigation.  The considerations you mentioned of feeling revenge, reducing the feeling of helplessness and restoring dignity are very important, no less important than the possibility of preventing harm to others
consumer: Thanks for the support and confirmation. 
I am I will contact the club after consulting with other close people. and professional.
Could you please direct me - to a counseling center where I can meet with someone for a face-to-face consultation - if I need it later?
agent: There is a possibility of an assistance meeting with us at the assistance centers for victims of sexual assault. What region of the country are you from?
consumer: Tel Aviv
agent: The assistance here on WhatsApp is national and I'm from the north. If and when you want a meeting, I suggest you call 1202 or 1203 (helpline for men) and you can coordinate there
consumer: Great.
Thank you very much for the support and conversation. 
Much gratitude to have someone to talk to
agent: Filing a complaint with the police is sometimes a difficult experience for which you need to prepare emotionally. If you decide to file a complaint, you can apply that one of our volunteers will accompany you
Agent: Good luck
consumer: Thank you very much

Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I'm Liat, I saw that you contacted us during the hours when the WhatsApp helpline was not active. The confusion you raised about how to know if you are ready to sleep for the first time is logical and understandable and we can continue to talk about it. We are a helpline for victims of sexual assault, and it might be more appropriate for you to contact the Kol HaHatami forum where they talk anonymously about sexual issues

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
consumer: I don't really know what they say and how to start
consumer: One therapist introduced you to me and I promised to try before I do any more nonsense
agent: Hi, I'm Anat, volunteering at an aid center. It's really not easy to open up for the first time and there is no one right way to start talking.
consumer: Hi Anat
consumer: I've been hospitalized in the heart of Sharon for a week and a half and today an extreme case happened and I feel really bad about myself and that I don't deserve help
agent: It sounds like the case you went through today overwhelmed you, you are welcome to share your feelings following the case or before it
consumer: My treatment was canceled and a friend who said she would come did not come and I was alone for many hours and suddenly I felt such an attack of being worthless and that I am worthless and that she did not come I had nothing and I just wanted to die, a real and deep desire to end everything, I got scared, I started crying in serious hysterics, I couldn't get up to ask for help and I wanted to hang myself and I couldn't find where so I took the rubber band and then somehow I went into a flashback and suffocated myself and completely disconnected until the therapist who was supposed to To be with her came forward and found me disconnected with the rubber band around my neck and slowly took me out of it..
consumer: That's what happened
consumer: And they debated whether to keep me here or not.. I said I wanted to stay to close the process but I don't know if that's true..
agent: You describe a seizure situation that scared you so much that you wanted to end your life so as not to face it
consumer: Yes.. and it was scary
cons umer: Because I have a life outside
agent: I can understand the fear and frustration you felt following the incident
consumer: And the loneliness here is killing me
consumer: I don't really want to die, I have a pretty full life outside and many power centers and these attacks are scary
agent: It's not easy to deal with memories from the past and feel alone with them, even when you're seemingly in a place that protects you and cares for you
consumer: And then the disconnection
consumer: and the flashback
consumer: I relived the situation until my brain remembers it
agent: The fact that you have a full life outside is important to the process you are dealing with, with all the difficulty you are going through it sounds like you really want to succeed in healing
consumer: Yes, I want to
consumer: That's why I said I wanted to stay
con sumer: Although it seems that the matzah has gotten worse by now
consumer: But maybe now that I've reached the extreme, things are starting to calm down..
consumer: I hope so anyway
agent: You are kind to yourself and that is so important, you deserve to take care of yourself
consumer: I wish I was really kind to myself..
agent: The flashbacks and disconnections come and go and disrupt the routine and it's really hard, but it sounds like you know what you want and need to do. And it's good to talk about things
consumer: After all the suicidal attempts and a severe eating disorder, I'm doing a lot of shock to my body
agent: It is not easy to deal with trauma and along the way we sometimes take a path that hurts ourselves in order to weaken the mental distress
consumer: Yes exactly.. that's why I started feeling vulnerable the self, to transfer the mental pain to physical pain
consumer: But beyond vomiting I have not hurt myself, at least until today, for a long time..
agent: The fear is that it happened to you during treatment, on the other hand you are in a safe place and it is good that the therapist found you and someone to talk to about the case
consumer: I don't know but how long I was like that until she came
consumer: The psychiatrist thought of releasing me..
agent: actually what's scarier beyond the seizure and the desire to die was the disconnection and loss of control over what happened to you
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I felt he was here in the room
consumer: The first thing I asked when I came back was if he was still here
agent: There would be a really hard flashback
consumer: Yes.. It's never been like this
agent: It's so important to talk about these things , it is not obvious that you are able to tell what happened and what is going through you during the flashback and at the same time take care of yourself. It takes a lot of courage
consumer: I don't feel brave..
consumer: I feel like a bad person, even though I didn't do it on purpose, but I really succeeded everyone here
consumer: And maybe they won't accept me next time here
consumer: And maybe I ruined everything
agent: You spelled in distress and didn't consciously choose to harm yourself. You said the psychiatrist let you make a decision whether to stay
agent: *You were
consumer: Yes, she was debating herself and asked me
consumer: And I don't know if I made the right decision
consumer: I undertook to contact the team to ask for help..
agent: Any decision you would make is the right decision, and in this case as you said b In other words, after you've been in a scary state of self-harm, you might find it easier to know in the future when to stop yourself
agent: and ask for help
consumer: yes.. maybe after I reached the extreme the situation will calm down a bit..
consumer: Thank you
agent: You're welcome, that's what we're here for. You are welcome to talk to us whenever you feel the need

Hey
I don't really know what they say and how to start
One therapist introduced you to me and I promised to try before I do another stupid thing
Hi Anat
I have been hospitalized in the heart of Sharon for a week and a half and today an extreme case happened and I feel really bad about myself and that I don't deserve help
My treatment was canceled and a friend who said she would come didn't come and I was alone for many hours and suddenly I felt such an attack of not being worth anything and that I wasn't worth anything and that I didn't care about anything and I just wanted to die, a real and deep desire to end everything, I got scared, I started crying in serious hysterics, I couldn't get up to ask Help and I wanted to hang myself and I couldn't find where so I took the rubber band and then somehow I went into a flashback and suffocated myself and completely disconnected until the therapist who was supposed to To be with her came forward and found me disconnected with the rubber band around my neck and slowly took me out of it..
That is what happened
And they debated whether to keep me here or not.. I said I wanted to stay to close the process but I don't know if that's true..
Yes.. and it was scary
Because I have a life outside
And the loneliness here is killing me
I don't really want to die, I have a pretty full life outside and a lot of power centers and these attacks are scary
And then the disconnection
And the flashback
I relived the situation as far as my mind remembers it
Yes, I want
That's why I said I wanted to stay

But maybe now that I've reached the extreme, things are starting to calm down..
I hope anyway
I wish I was really good to myself..

But other than vomiting, I haven't hurt myself, at least until today, for a long time.
I don't know how long I was like that until she came
The psychiatrist thought of releasing me..
Yes
I felt he was here in the room
The first thing I asked when I got back was if he was still here
Yes.. it was never like this

I feel like a bad person, even though I didn't do it on purpose but I really succeeded everyone here
And maybe they won't accept me next time here
And maybe I ruined everything

And I don't know if I made the right decision

Thanks

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, can we consult?
agent: Good evening, yes we can consult
consumer: I have a friend who was sexually assaulted, as a result of which she is in a very unstable and sensitive state of mind
consumer: does not wish to apply through the cash register to get help so that there is no documentation for this
consumer: Lives in the Ashkelon area
consumer: Is it possible to help her?
agent: First of all, it's very sad to hear that your friend went through such a traumatic event, it's not an easy situation at all.. Of course, your friend is always welcome to contact us for an assistance call either on the 1202 phone line or on the WhatsApp line. It is important to note that the assistance calls are not a substitute for professional treatment.
consumer: Is professional help also provided by a psychologist?
consumer: Guess she'll need help in the long run
con sumer: What means are available to her?
agent: Through us there are assistance calls by phone, WhatsApp, and at the assistance center closest to her home. You can check the possibility of escorts (police station, medical examination, committees, the court, etc.), if she is interested - it will be possible to check for her specialized therapists in the field of sexual abuse in her area of ​​residence.
consumer: I would appreciate it if you could direct me to someone in the Ashkelon area
agent: In addition, it will be possible to check associations operating in her area of ​​residence for the benefit of subsidized treatment. But you have to take into account that the wait can be long - more than six months.
consumer: It's been a long time
agent: If you are interested, you can leave a phone number + name so that they can contact you with an organized list of nannies in the area Ashkelon from the nearest aid center
consumer: I would love to, thank you very much for the help
consumer: Sion 054-2868550
agent: Unfortunately, fully subsidized treatment through associations involves a long wait.. 
I will forward your details to the coordinator who can contact you regarding the treatment
consumer: Okay, at the same time I would be happy if they would recommend me a specialist therapist in this field also privately
agent: That's fine, both associations and private nannies
consumer: Thank you very much for the answer and help
agent: Of course, we are here for you and your company

Hello, can I have a consultation?
I have a friend who was sexually assaulted, as a result of which she is in a very unstable and sensitive state of mind
She does not wish to apply through the cash register to receive help so that there is no documentation for this
Lives in the Ashkelon area
Can she be helped?
Is professional help also provided by a psychologist?
Guess she'll need help in the long run
What means are available to her?
I would appreciate it if you could direct me to someone in the Ashkelon area
It's a lot of time
I would love to, thank you very much for the help
Sivan 054-2868550
Okay, at the same time I would be happy if they would recommend me a therapist who is an expert in this field also privately
Thank you very much for the answer and help

ואני יודעת שאין לי שום סיכוי נגדו, הוא גדול ממני בכמה שנים- 15 שנים, לא ידעתי את זה לפני שיצאנו, וכשאמרתי לו שאני חוששת מהפערים המיניים שמסתבר שיש, הוא אמר לי שהכל יהיה בקצב שלי וששום דבר לא יהיה בניגוד לרצוני, ואז כשהיינו ברכב, הוא ניסה ולא הסכמתי וניסיתי להתנגד אבל הוא הרבה חזק ממני והוא רק אמר לי שיהיה לי כיף, ושאני לא אפחד, ואחכ הוא החזיר אותי הביתה כאילו כלום לא קרה ונתן לי נשיקה, ושהיום אמרתי לו, הוא אמר לי שהוא לא מבין על מה אני מדברת ושהוא היה איתי בכל המובנים....
תודה שאת כאן
זה הפתיע אותי מאוד, ודווקא ציפיתי שבגיל הזה תהיה יותר הכלה והבנה , שהוא יהיה בסדר איתי
לא, הוא היה בלי קונדום, והוא אפילו לא שאל אותי אחכ האם אני צריכב פטסטינור
אני לא יודעת האם הוא גמר בפנים או בחוץ, אבל אני חושבת שזה יותר בטוח לקחת, נכון?

ומה הבדיקות הנוספות שיש בחדר אקוטי ואין אצל רופאת נשים?
תודה, אבל לא, אני בת 21
זה כל כך מאתגר לפנות לחדר אקוטי זמן קצר אחרי הפגיעה, אני לא רוצה להתפשט מול מישהו ,אבל מצד שני אני גם לא רוצה להצטער בעתיד על זה שלא פניתי...
תודה על הכל!! 
אני אומנם לא מכירה אותך ,ואת לא מכירה אותי, אבל זה מחזק אותי, באמת תודה!!!
המתנדבות יושבות בבית חולים? אני פשוט עוד לא החלטתי מתי והאם, השאלה אם תהיה מתנדבת זמינה בהתראה קצרה?
האמת שהיום ניסתי להתקשר למספר והטלפון חוסם לי את האפשרות, ייתכן?
תודה רבה רבה!!!! שיהיה לך המשך יום מקסים

consumer: Hello
I wanted to know how long after it is still relevant to do the test? 
And can it be done in other places besides Hadassah Ein Kerem?
Agent: Hello.
agent: I am writing you something that is a copy and paste, information from the Ministry of Health
agent: The Ministry of Health recommends that victims contact an acute center as quickly as possible (up to seven days) from the incident, so that an immediate response can be provided that includes medical treatment, psychological response, and a forensic medical examination. You can contact the acute center at any time of the day and any day of the year.
If possible, it is recommended to coordinate arrival with the center's staff by phone:
• Galilee Medical Center, Lotem, Nahariya, 04-9107287
• Kaplan Medical Center, Lotus, Rehovot, phone between 08:00-15:00 - 08 -9441531, phone from 15:00 - 08-9441580
• Ichilov, Neta, Tel Aviv and the center, phone 03-6423906, *2329
• Wolfson, room 4, Tel Aviv and the center, emergency number: 03-5028313, social service: 03-50284545
• Hillel Yaffe, Helena Center, Hadera and surroundings, 04-7748206, social service: 04-7744268
• Bnei Zion, room 10, Haifa and surroundings, emergency number: 04-8359210, social service: 04-8359300
• Hadassah Ein Kerem, Bat Ami, Jerusalem and surroundings, emergency number: 02-6777222, social service: 02-6778082
• Soroka, southern region, sorting: 08-6400462, social service: 08-6400327
• Furia, Tana center, Tiberias and the region, 04-6652481
• Yoseftal, Eilat, reception: 08-6358011
• The English Hospital, North - Nazareth, 074-755 9049
Full contact information for the acute centers on the Ministry of Health website: https://www.gov.il/he/departments/general/sexual-assault-survivors-healthcare-system
agent: According to the list, you can see that there is no other acute room in Jerusalem except Ein Kerem.
consumer: What is considered rape?
consumer: Thank you!
agent: But you can try to reach Kaplan, Wolfson and Ichilov, who are in the vicinity of Jerusalem
consumer: ?
agent: Are you asking from a legal point of view?
consumer: also, not only.
agent: Because it is often a subjective matter, a feeling and not necessarily how the legal system defines it.
consumer: I understand, and how does the legal system define it?
agent: Rape is forcing someone to perform sexual acts. when there is no free consent. agent: In terms of the law in Israel - rape must be related to coercion that includes penetration of the genital organ. And anything else will be considered an act of sodom.
agent: free consent, meaning that it is completely free from influences, such as the influence of pressure or threat from a boss, someone in an elected position who can influence the future, a teacher over a student, a commander over a soldier, a large group over a single person, etc.
agent: senior*
agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? I guess you're not just asking for general knowledge, if you want to talk a little, I'm here for you.
consumer: thank you thank you!!! You normalized my feeling!!!
consumer: Yesterday, I went on a date and it was good, and I agreed to kiss but I didn't agree to anything else
consumer: But that's not it It doesn't matter to him
consumer: And he did what he wanted
agent: I'm so sorry you went through this. It's so unfair. infuriating
agent: If you decide to go to an acute room like you asked about, know that you can also ask for an escort from a volunteer of an aid center in your area.
agent: And in general, it's important to me that you know that you don't have to be alone with what happened to you.
agent: It's good that you turned here.
consumer: Even though I said no several times, and I don't even know if there was full penetration or not - it was my first time, and I don't want to go get tested because I don't want to be touched, but I'm also afraid that I might have contracted a sexually transmitted disease, I'll take Postinor Today.
And I know I have no chance against him, he's a few years older than me - 15 years, I didn't know that before we left, and when I told him that I was afraid of the sexual gaps that it turns out to be, he told me that everything would be at my pace and that nothing would be against my will, then when we were in the car, he tried and I didn't agree and I tried to resist but he is much stronger than me and he just said I want to have fun, and that I won't be afraid, and then he brought me back home as if nothing had happened and gave me a kiss, and that today I told him, he told me that he didn't understand what I was talking about and that he was with me in every sense....
consumer: Thank you for being here
agent: what he did is the exact opposite of being with you. He was not with you in any sense. He had his inclination and trampled on your possibility to choose what you want.
agent: Also his age gap, of course Really surprised you. I hope at least with his age he knew he had to use a condom. If not, it's maddening.
consumer: It surprised me a lot, and I actually expected that at this age there would be more inclusion and understanding, that he would be fine with me
consumer: No, he was without a condom, and he didn't even ask me later if I was taking Patstinor
consumer: I don't know if he finished inside or outside, but I think it's safer to take, right?
agent: Cumming inside or outside is the same, because there is premature ejaculation which can lead to pregnancy. I recommend not taking such a risk because later it's a much more complex procedure if, God forbid, you get pregnant.
agent: Yes, it is important that you know that Postiner can disrupt your menstruation, and delay Wm for pain. Be ready for it.
agent: If you don't want to go to a hospital emergency room, you should go to a gynecologist and ask for blood and urine tests for sexually transmitted diseases without a vaginal exam. You don't have to share what happened to you.
consumers:

agent: Continuing with the issue of the criminal procedure, I also recommend keeping the correspondence between you.
agent: of course it's only your choice if you want to act on the issue in a legal way.

consumer: Thanks for everything!! 
I don't know you, and you don't know me, but it strengthens me, really thank you!!!

agent: You can contact the number 1202, it will connect you to the center in your area of ​​residence, explain that you would like to be escorted to the acute room, the assistant on the line will contact the coordinator who would like to speak with you to recommend whether it is worth going immediately or if we can wait. consumer: Hi
Agent: Hi
consumer: can we talk?
agent: Of course, I'm here with you
consumer: So at the age of 16 I was raped and I was very drunk 
And I don't remember too much of what happened except that I said no and that I was on my period 
And the day after that at school I asked the guy if he was into me And he laughed and made jokes and then I took Postinor 
It's something that accompanies me to this day, I'm 22 today
agent: This must be a very upsetting experience for you.. Would you like to share with me how you feel?
consumer: I feel drained 
With all the things I try to do on a daily basis and I don't talk to anyone about this rape
Even in therapy I don't get to talk about it
agent: After going through such a traumatic experience for body and soul it can sometimes be difficult to talk about it
consumer: Yes, that's right 
It just got to the point where I want to open the issue and don't know how to deal with it 
I can't blame the guy on the police because I don't have any proof or anything like that
agent: It's really very scary to open up and talk after you don't talk that much In time.. what will they say, why didn't I speak up before, what will happen after everyone knows..
consumer: I'm afraid they'll say I'm exaggerating or something like that
agent: When you don't believe the truth it's very offensive and doesn't attack in case you pass
consumer: The simple thing is that I drank a lot that night... it was exactly at the time when I started having a problem with drugs and alcohol 
And he drank too 
But all this chasing after the guilty is not important 
It is important to understand that I was very hurt
agent: It's really, really important to feel validated when you're hurt..
agent: The shift is about to end. I understand that you cannot continue chatting right now and I am saying goodbye to you. The WhatsApp line will be available again tomorrow starting at 17.00

agent: In the meantime, I wish you a good evening

consumer: Because he is terribly nervous
consumer: Can you recommend therapists in the Tiberias area?
consumer: And is it paid? and if so how much
consumer: ?
agent: First of all I am sorry to hear. Surely this is very difficult news to deal with as a mother. It goes without saying that you enlist to help your son. And this treatment is indeed the most recommended way to help him, if he agrees. I understand that you are from the Tiberias area. The assistance center responsible for your area is the Galilee-Golan Assistance Center, each center has a coordinator who knows the specialist therapists in our field in the area. I would recommend contacting the assistance center in your area, and asking the coordinator for recommendations. There are treatments through welfare and there are private ones. Are you looking for private or subsidized treatment?

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, is it possible to consult you regarding a certain matter?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I am here at your disposal
consumer: Hello, I am currently 21 years old, but between the ages of 15-18 I was in a relationship with someone who was about 3 years older than me. 
Today, apparently, I am traumatized by the matter. During the relationship, many things were done that I think are illegal. But I'm not sure. Is there someone to consult with about this? If it does turn out that the things she did were indeed illegal, is it possible to take legal action on the matter?
agent: Hello, it's hard to be traumatized for so long
consumer: yes...
But is there anyone I can consult with regarding the filing of things that have been done?
Agent: Absolutely, would you like to Discuss it on the phone with Moshei or correspond?
consumer: I would prefer to correspond
agent: Gladly, I'm here
consumer: At the beginning of the relationship she was very much based on the sexual assault she went through in the past. If she hadn't told me that, we wouldn't be together. 
Recently it became clear to me that she may have invented the attack.
She would buy me alcohol. Several times she hired me. And we've slept numerous times when she and I or just me are drunk.
I expressed several times that I was not interested in sex when we were drunk because it would have hurt her.
There were other things that are difficult for me to open right now.
I don't know how much there is to do with it.
agent: Sorry for asking, but from what's written I don't understand if I'm talking / mech Are you with a man or a woman?
consumer: I am trans and use what flows near me
agent: It's really hard to live with such trauma for so many years. Have you been in therapy?
consumer: Yes, I'm still in therapy
consumer: Are the things I mentioned legal?
agent: I don't know, I'm not anymore, you should consult with legal aid or something else
consumer: What is meant by legal aid?
agent: You are asking about the legality of the acts, and legal advice can be obtained at any assistance center.
agent: Is the treatment you are receiving helping you?
consumer: Where is an assistance center close to Sderot?
Consumer: Yes
agent: There is in Be'er Sheva, and maybe also the center for men. I will send you the details of both
agent: Maslan's direct phone number (assistance center for victims and victims of sexual assault and violence Negev Beer Sheva) is 08-6421313.
Their email is: siyua@maslan.org.il
agent: The direct telephone number of the men's helpline is 03-5179179.
Their email is: Supervision@ta1202.org
There is also a helpline for anxious men. The phone number is 02-5328000
agent: You will discuss the actions with your therapist
consumer: I spoke
consumer: I'm slowly opening up
agent: It takes time to open
agent: My shift is about to end, would you like to share more?
agent: My shift is ending. I wish you a good evening

consumer: Good evening. I finished the 11th grade this year. In the middle of this year, I passed out sexually from a classmate. There was an intervention by P.S. who supported my request not to pass on the information to my parents. At the end of the school year, it was decided in a yeshiva that despite my parents' wishes, they must receive the information. Since then my life at home has become bad and restless because my parents do not know how to contain difficulties. I ask where are your rights to protect my privacy. Does the fact that I am still a student even though I am 18 plus cancel my rights?
agent: Good evening, I'm with you
agent: I understand that your parents have already received the information
Consumer: Yes
agent: It must be difficult when there is no understanding from the parents
consumer: Of course. The question is whether there was an exception here to what is allowed by law since I was over 18 years old
agent: good question

agent: In everything that happened

agent: when the trust.

On the other hand, there is a law in the State of Israel designed to protect minors who have been harmed, if they have been harmed by someone responsible for them or in the family or in an educational institution. That's why you probably reported to your parents. But because I'm not an expert in the law, it's worth calling the Lynn house in your area, you don't have to identify yourself, and ask this question. or to the assistance center and ask to speak with the legal proceedings coordinator. 1202 or 1203. I wish for you that the parents receive assistance (also possible at an assistance center) so that they know how to be with you and for you.

consumer: I was 7 years old, and like any normal girl I played a board game. It was a train game. The parents had to I went out and they asked me if I could manage without a babysitter or if they couldn't trust me. I told them that of course they could trust me, and I promised that I would not open the door to anyone, neither strangers nor their friends as they requested. It seemed easy, you didn't have to open the door at all. I can stand it. That's what I thought.
After a while there was a knock at the door. I'm trying to figure out who it is, says a friend of mother's. I asked him which friend? And he kept repeating the same sentence. I insisted and asked again, and he said some name that sounded made up, but pressured me to open the door. I stood between myself and hesitated. open? But they asked me not to. I told him I couldn't reach the house keys, they were hanging on me d the door Bring a chair and get on it. I had no strength, but I did it anyway. I dragged him, climbed him, reached the keys, and held them in my hand. what to do now? I asked. He answered - open the door. I didn't know how to open the door. Put the key in the hole and turn it, he said. I opened the door for him. First time in my life I open the door of the house. 
A foreign man who is about 40 years older than me entered and closed the door behind him. He looked at the game and asked me what I was playing. I told him trains. I went to show him the game, and he asked me where the kitchen was. I pointed at him with my hand and he went to the kitchen, started opening cupboards. I see him with his back to me, and while searching, he asks me where there are glasses?. turn off I gave him a drink and he took out a glass, filled it with tap water and opened a drawer, pulled out a spoon. I look at him in bewilderment at the sound of the spoon clicking in the glass, as if stirring something. He comes back to me with the glass and tells me two. I tell him I'm not thirsty, but then he gets angry and insists that I drink. I took a sip. Finish it! angry at me I drank until the end, he took the glass and looked stressed. Very quickly I felt dizzy and he told me you are tired, come to sleep. He stands me up and takes my hand and leads me to my parents' bedroom. There when we got close to the bed I already lost consciousness. 
After an unspecified time I wake up, covered with a blanket in my parents' bed, look to my left and see the same man standing and just zipping up his pants. I am vague . I look around and do not understand what is happening. You fell asleep he said. I lift the blanket and marvel at the sight of my naked body. I look at the floor and see my clothes thrown. Why am I not dressed? I asked him. Your clothes fell off while you were sleeping. replied It sounded strange to me, but I didn't argue. And why do I hurt? I asked. He was already angry. Get up and get dressed, quick! said angrily. He seemed to want to go. I couldn't move. He picked up my clothes and dressed me himself. He grabbed my hand again and picked me up and dragged me down the hall to the living room. And I'm confused and don't understand what's going on. He sits me down on the floor, and gives me an instruction - mom is coming soon, tell her that I just arrived and that we just played the board game. he b He will make it difficult for me to go back after him and make sure I understood the instruction. 
Not long after that my mother returns, to the sight of a strange man with her little daughter. Who is?? What is he doing here?? she shouts in her expression. I'm her friend, I just came to play with her. he says calmly. My mother is angry, and I reinforce his words that indeed he just arrived and that's how it was. She shoos him away with shouts and kicks, and he quickly runs away. She stands in front of me, holding me tightly. Did he do something to you??. I did not answer. We were just playing a board game. So why do you look tired? It's early in the day. I just got tired of the game... I answered and she, with a frightened expression on her face, calmed down a bit, and I went to sleep in bed.

After a while there was a knock at the door. I'm trying to figure out who it is, says a friend of mother's. I asked a And what friend? And he kept repeating the same sentence. I insisted and asked again, and he said some name that sounded made up, but pressured me to open the door. I stood between myself and hesitated. open? But they asked me not to. I told him I couldn't reach the house keys, they were hanging upside down by the door. Bring a chair and get on it. I had no strength, but I did it anyway. I dragged him, climbed him, reached the keys, and held them in my hand. what to do now? I asked. He answered - open the door. I didn't know how to open the door. Put the key in the hole and turn it, he said. I opened the door for him. First time in my life I open the door of the house. 
A foreign man who is about 40 years older than me entered and closed after him the door. He looked at the game and asked me what I was playing. I told him trains. I went to show him the game, and he asked me where the kitchen was. I pointed at him with my hand and he went to the kitchen, started opening cupboards. I see him with his back to me, and while searching, he asks me where there are glasses?. I directed him and he took out a glass, filled it with tap water and opened a drawer, pulled out a spoon. I look at him in bewilderment at the sound of the spoon clicking in the glass, as if stirring something. He comes back to me with the glass and tells me two. I tell him I'm not thirsty, but then he gets angry and insists that I drink. I took a sip. Finish it! angry at me I drank until the end, he took the glass and looked stressed. Very quickly I felt dizzy and he told me the Tired, come to sleep. He stands me up and takes my hand and leads me to my parents' bedroom. There when we got close to the bed I already lost consciousness. 
After an unspecified time I wake up, covered with a blanket in my parents' bed, look to my left and see the same man standing and just zipping up his pants. I am vague. I look around and do not understand what is happening. You fell asleep he said. I lift the blanket and marvel at the sight of my naked body. I look at the floor and see my clothes thrown. Why am I not dressed? I asked him. Your clothes fell off while you were sleeping. replied It sounded strange to me, but I didn't argue. And why do I hurt? I asked. He was already angry. Get up and get dressed, quick! said angrily. He seemed to want to go. I didn't make it and z. He picked up my clothes and dressed me himself. He grabbed my hand again and picked me up and dragged me down the hall to the living room. And I'm confused and don't understand what's going on. He sits me down on the floor, and gives me an instruction - mom is coming soon, tell her that I just arrived and that we just played the board game. He asked me to follow him and make sure I understood the instruction. 
Not long after that my mother returns, to the sight of a strange man with her little daughter. Who is?? What is he doing here?? she shouts in her expression. I'm her friend, I just came to play with her. he says calmly. My mother is angry, and I reinforce his words that indeed he just arrived and that's how it was. She shoos him away with shouts and kicks, and he quickly runs away. She stands in front of me, holding me tightly. Did he do something to you?? . I did not answer. We were just playing a board game. So why do you look tired? It's early in the day. I just got tired of the game... I answered and she, with a frightened expression on her face, calmed down a bit, and I went to sleep in bed.

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, I have a question. I am a manager at a manufacturing plant and one of the employees told me today that the school invited her and they informed her that her almost 9 year old daughter complained to the teacher that her 14 year old son had touched her in intimate places. The son looks after the daughter while the parents are at work. She was asked at school to keep the daughter away from the rest of the family and leave her under the supervision of her mother 24 hours a day, and the mother did so. Today she returned to work after a week's illness and cried. She claims that she doesn't believe her daughter but has no choice so she kept her away from the rest of the family but she doesn't know what to do and how to proceed from here. Can you advise her?
consumer: Thanks, I'll wait for the message
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
agent: The mother and daughter should go to Lin's house
consumer: She is from Od is afraid that something will be done to her son.
consumer: She thinks the girl is lying
agent: I recommend Beit Lin again. There the girl and the mother can talk to professionals
consumer: ok thanks
agent: You can direct the mother to consult with us as well. or in anonymous chat
agent: By the way, you can also contact Beit Lin.
consumer: Yes, I will call her tomorrow morning, thanks
agent: with the mother?
agent: Look, by and large we don't want and don't want to believe that such a terrible thing happened. But the girl was probably hurt and felt a clear need to talk to the teacher. To help a mother who is really in a very complex situation, you should talk to someone who can help. At Beit Lin she will be able to receive assistance in every respect. It is important to remember that there is a legal obligation to report cases of injury to Teens
agent: In any case, it is also possible to consult as I wrote in Kolmila's chat anonymously
agent: You can also ask the mother if she would like an assistance coordinator to contact her
agent: The shift is over. The WhatsApp line will be available again tomorrow starting at 17.00
transcriptConsumer_en:
Hello, I have a question. I am a manager at a manufacturing plant and one of the employees told me today that the school invited her and they informed her that her almost 9 year old daughter complained to the teacher that her 14 year old son had touched her in intimate places. The son looks after the daughter while the parents are at work. She was asked at school to keep the daughter away from the rest of the family and leave her under the supervision of her mother 24 hours a day, and the mother did so. Today she returned to work after a week's illness and cried. She claims that she doesn't believe her daughter but has no choice so she kept her away from the rest of the family but she doesn't know what to do and how to proceed from here. Can you advise her?
Thanks, I'll wait for the message
She is very afraid that something will be done to her son.
She thinks the girl is lying
Ok thank you
Yes, I will call her tomorrow morning, thanks

agent: Okay, there is no doubt that the soul hurts and the feeling of suffocation follows the burning soul

agent: Does it attack you all day or only during these hours?
consumer: I'm constantly in pain, I wake up from it at night
consumer: I'm fed up

agent: do you live alone at home?

consumer: please
consumer: b I tried every possible option and I don't want to think about it anymore because there is no solution
consumer: n
consumer: I'm alone, nobody cares about me, every time I go in and out of toxic friendships
consumer: My life is in a constant loop of disintegration
consumer: And my bones hurt already

consumer: But please, please, no solutions
consumer: Just be with me in pain, I don't want to be alone now

consumer: I feel as if my body is being torn from the inside out agent: You describe a situation similar to suffocation. The body actually opposes the mental state

agent: Mental pain causes severe physical pain, this is evident from your words

agent: According to the description of your pain, you are dealing with pain that goes from the heart to the whole body

consumer: what does it matter?
consumer: It just hurts
consumer: at an indescribable level
agent: The mental pain you describe simply paralyzes you

consumer: I'm already losing it
agent: There are women who describe situations as if and when they embrace the Ab suddenly everything fades away. I don't know if right now it suits you, but being in the pain and doing guided imagery can help

agent: The most important thing is not to raise your hands. You talk to me and that already shows that you care about yourself
consumer: I have nothing to say
agent: You have reached the place saturated with pain and it paralyzes you from thinking and of course speaking

agent: still you talk to me and I think it's something important that you do for yourself, it's not obvious that with such a feeling you manage to talk to me
consumer: But it doesn't really matter
agent: sometimes at that moment you don't attach importance to it, but later it kind of frees up space for other things

consumer: Hello
My story is complicated...
In the short version
We three sisters were hurt by our elder brother....
Each at the age of 16
each once
Each at a sensitive time
We didn't grow up at home and despite all that he found the time to rape
In terms of the injury, it is rape without penetration, but in a locked place at night with no possibility of escape.
We grew up and for years we carried each other in our stomachs without knowing about each other. The situation now is that each of them is being treated by a psychologist in their city of residence, but my older sister wants to file a complaint with the police, which doesn't seem to help, and the other sister wants huge financial compensation... I just want him to change and go to therapy, what is the recommendation to do in such a situation..?
agent: Hi, did you read what you wrote and I understand that very not Simply the situation you are in, each one wants to deal with it in a different way
consumer: yes...
consumer: Also each in a different state of mind than the other now
consumer: My fear that one of them will be reckless...
agent: Everyone copes differently and it's really not an easy thing to go through and now to find out that you're not the only one this happened to.
agent: What is recklessness for you?
consumer: stand up and file a complaint or scream at him for no purpose..
consumer: And he doesn't know that we remember and know about each other..
agent: Are you in such a relationship that we can meet and talk about things?
Consumer: Yes
consumer: My sister works in Tel and implements all the flooding...
agent: Do you volunteer at Tel?
consumer: Our father knows and Tita knew it...
consumer: working
Agent: Mao D. It's hard to walk around with the feeling that things happened at home, in a place where you're supposed to be protected. Especially as a young girl. But it's good that you and your sisters are in touch and maybe it's right for you to meet and try to think together or consult on what is the right thing to do. Because each person is different and each one is suited to something different, and it is possible that in the end each one will act according to what is right and suits her
consumer: The point is that the man was separated now and with his wife you know he will divorce and they have two babies
agent: I understand that you are trying to protect him, but he is the one doing the offending
consumer: Absolutely
consumer: so what to do?
agent: I think that in the first step you will all meet and see together if we can decide on something common that suits all of them.
consumer: Ok, let's move on
agent: If you come to a decision together That's fine, and if not, in the end, as adults, everyone will have the opportunity to act according to what they think is right.

agent: How many years have passed?

ואז לפני שנתיים עברתי אונס מהידיד שלי אחרי הרבה ניסיונות אובדנות מהתיכון רק לפני שנה כמעט מתתי 100 כדורים ציפרלקס אקמול אושפזתי במחלקה פסיכיאטרית ברזילי שלושה חודשים מנהלת מחלקה עוסית שם חשבתי שיקמו אותי שמו אותי  באישפוז בוועדה סל שיקום לקראת שיחרור הישתחררתי אחרי 10 ימים מהסל שיקום הוועדה בתאריך 10.4.22 הישתחררתי ב 19.4.22 אחד החלטות זה שירות לאומי עם ליווי שזה שקר כזב אין פה שום ליווי  והוסטל לצעירים בכלל לא מתאים לי כי אני ניפגעת עבירה לא מתאים לי מעורב  לא התאים לי מ24.4 עד 28.8 שנה שעברתי הישתחררתי מהמחלקה הפסיכיאטרית רק 19.4 שנה שעברה 
ואז חזרתי הביתה ניכנסתי לשירות לאומי הזה בלי ספק ניכנס הספק הייתי חודש בשירות לאומי עברתי היתעללות נוראית השנה גם מהשירות לאומי 
(גם היתנהגות פוגענית גם כלפי הסל שיקום שזה לא הוסיף )
סבלתי מקולות חצי שנה 
וגם אבחנה ocd  אני מצטערת ניכנסתי לשירות לאומי הזה 
אני מתפרקת בצדק כי יצאתי מאיזון נפשי גם מחכה לטיפול יום שלי ועד שלא יסיים לא יכולה להתחיל טיפול זה לא דבר משקם דבר פגע בי האיזון הנפשי שלי החמיר החזיר את הפגיעות עצמיות 
אמרתי כבר בנובמבר שנה שעברה שאני לא רוצה להמשיך אמא שלי מכוונה טובה חשבה השירות יועיל לי אבל כולם שמו עלי פס גם אנשי השיקום שמו פס על התחושות שלי על זה שרציתי לסיים מזמן תשירות לעזוב לא לעשות 
הינה אני סובלת בשירות לאומי הזה עם חרדות חרא 
עם פלאשבקים היתקפי פוסט טראומה קשים 
אין ספק אני מתפרקת נפשית אני לא יכולה לסבול את זה עוד !

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
agent: Hi, I'm Anat and I'm with you if it's convenient for you to chat now
consumer: Hi
agent: How are you?
consumer: a little overwhelmed
agent: Would you like to share what caused the emotional flooding?
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I'm just experiencing a lot of dissociations in the last few days
consumer: And it really sucks
agent: Dissociation in itself can be a jarring experience
consumer: It shakes me less, I'm so used to it
consumer: It's annoying when it happens outside
consumer: Or not at the end of the day
agent: It sounds like you leave dealing with the pain for the moments that are convenient for you and when it suddenly happens in the middle of the day, it overwhelms you with the pain and other emotions
consumer: does not experience pain
consumer: It's just exhausting
consumer: Let's say now I'm already 10 Minutes trying to prepare food
consumer: And every time I lose myself
agent: It sounds like coming back from disconnection is difficult for you
consumer: This is not a repetition
consumer: I'm still disconnected
agent: Now that we're talking, you feel like you're disconnected
Consumer: Yes
agent: You want us to try to get out of the disconnection together
Consumer: Yes
agent: You said you are trying to prepare food, you can write me what you are preparing
agent: I'm with you
consumer: I have pasta on the gas
consumer: But I don't know how long she's been there
consumer: And I want to make a salad (with pasta)
agent: You manage to make sure that the water doesn't evaporate completely, that the pasta doesn't burn
consumer: There is more water
consumer: I just don't remember how many minutes passed
agent: You can take one pasta with a fork and taste. If it is soft you can turn off the heat
consumer: Ugh, it's hard for me to even stand
consumer: This is a stronger disconnection than you think
agent: Maybe you should turn off the fire and sit down for a moment to rest
agent: I'm with you
consumer: I'm not alone in the kitchen simply even if I say that I'm disconnected they won't pay attention
agent: It's reassuring that you're not alone. And it's good that you are able to describe your situation
agent: There is something special that usually helps you get out of disconnections
agent: song, smells, tastes
consumer: unfortunately not
agent: Can you describe to me who is with you in the kitchen?
consumer: mother and sister
agent: Can you hear if and what they are talking about?
consumer: I hear but it is not held by me
agent: It sounds like when you're disconnected everything around you feels like it's in slow motion
Consumer: Yes
age nt: Dear, my shift is going to end in a few minutes. Would you like me to try to transfer our conversation to the volunteer who came after me?
consumer: Yes, I would love to
agent: Ok, I'm saying goodbye to you right now and hope you feel better soon. It may take the volunteer some time to answer you
consumer: Okay, please
agent: Hi, I'm here with you.
consumer: Hi
consumer: Thank you
consumer: I can't get out of disconnection
agent: Can you describe where you are right now?
consumer: I know where I am
consumer: simply the disconnect continues to increase
agent: I understand that you are experiencing a disconnection, where are you right now?
consumer: at home
agent: Is there anything you know that can help you get out of disconnection?
consumer: I tried a shower consumer: helped for 10 minutes
agent: Would you like me to suggest more options for relaxation?
Consumer: Yes
agent: One option is to try breathing, I can write you the instructions, can that help you?
consumer: no no
consumer: breathing makes me sick :(
agent: I understand the difficulty of disconnecting, and that it is not appropriate for you to take breaths right now, let's try to think together what else can help. Can listening to the music you like help you?
consumer: I tried music
consumer: Oh, I have to buy reusable ice
consumer: This is so helpful
agent: I understand that the feeling of the cold helps you. Is it possible to put ice in a bag and use it instead?
consumer: I'll try
consumer: a second
consumer: I brought
consumer: maybe me I'll just give up and go to sleep
agent: does the ice help?
consumer: not so much
agent: sorry the ice doesn't help that much, you wrote that you were thinking of going to sleep, could it help?
consumer: It's just to end the day hoping I don't get up to disconnect an eraser
consumer: tomorrow
agent: I also hope that tomorrow will be better and you won't experience disconnection, I wish you a good night and we are here for you.
consumer: Thank you 
agent: A night of rest!
