consumer: Is there someone to talk to?
agent: Hi, I'm here. I'll be right with you okay?
consumer: ok
agent: How are you?
consumer: very bad
consumer: So many bad things happened and I can't contain everything anymore
agent: I'm here with you, listening to you
consumer: I had an abortion two days ago and right on the way there to do the abortion it happened naturally and got complicated and I needed surgery and I was awake almost the whole time and 4 days ago I was raped by a neighbor who lives next to me at my house and everything overwhelms me and comes back together in flashbacks
consumer: And I feel really bad, everything hurts and it's hard for me to breathe and I feel like there's a huge burning hole in the middle of my stomach and I'm shaking and I can't stop crying and I don't understand what's happening to me
agent: passed A very, very difficult days, the body and mind are very wounded and it is really normal that you are overwhelmed like this and feel what you feel
agent: It's good that you contacted us and didn't stay alone with the difficulty
consumer: I feel like I'm completely out of my mind 0
agent: You are not out of your mind, you are going through very extreme things and hardships that are hard to contain
consumer: I don't understand what's happening to me
agent: where are you now?
consumer: And I can't do anything, I can't move
consumer: at home
agent: are you protected now?
consumer: I don't know
agent: Is there someone who can hurt you at home?
consumer: I live alone
agent: So you are in your house now and there is no one inside the house threatening you
Consumer: Yes
agent: nice you can Tell me what you ate and drank today
consumer: I didn't eat anything
agent: You want us to try to go to the kitchen together now so that I can prepare something for you to eat and drink
consumer: I'm not sure I can stand up
agent: You are very weak mentally and physically because of what you went through
consumer: I just want it to end already
agent: There is something or someone you can ask for help
consumer: I don't have anyone
consumer: I have no friends and the family is not in the picture
agent: It's hard to be lonely
agent: You are dealing with a lot of one-sided fronts
consumer: I just want it to end
agent: Are you still bleeding after the abortion?
Consumer: Yes
agent: You really have to put fluids in your body
consumer: I can't
agent: Come on, try to sit down for a while d K. And after that we will try to stand together
consumer: I sat down
agent: what a champion you are
agent: When you can slowly slowly slowly at your own pace try to stand
consumer: It hurts and makes me feel really bad
agent: How far is the kitchen to take water
consumer: 30 steps
agent: Do you agree that we should try? Maybe lean against the wall slowly
consumer: I'm afraid
consumer: and it hurts to move
agent: Maybe we should order an ambulance to take you to the emergency room?
Consumer: No
agent: I'm making sure you dry off. When did you put something in here?
consumer: Yesterday evening before they released me they gave me liquids and food in a tube and water I drank in the morning
agent: perfectly fine
agent: Would you like us to take some breaths to relax?
Consumer: Yes
agent: you are great
agent: come n Try to take in air at a rate of 3 and take air out at a rate of 3 together
consumer: I can't sit anymore but it hurts too much
agent: If we gave up on the water then be whatever you want to happen
agent: how are we?
consumer: I can't do it
Agent: It's fine
agent: Can you tell me 3 colors around you?
consumer: red blue and green
agent: one champion
agent: Now please tell me what you smell
consumer: cigarettes
agent: Is the smell coming from outside?
Consumer: Yes
agent: It bothers you
Consumer: No
consumer: But the noise is
Agent: Nice
Agent: What are you hearing?
consumer: a truck in reverse, children screaming, motorcycles and cars moving, many birds and cats, and a karaoke night from the building across the street
agent: what not There is a serious garden outside
consumer: It sounds like it's inside my head
agent: There's a mess outside and inside you too, and it makes sense that you feel that way
consumer: It feels like all my senses are attacking me
consumer: Everything is louder and louder and more dazzling
agent: It's completely understandable that you feel that way
agent: Do you want us to try another exercise?
Consumer: Yes
Agent: Great. Now please try to close your eyes tightly and then open them. Like this 3 times
consumer: Can I have something else? Every time I close my eyes the flashbacks get stronger
agent: Of course it's good that you tell me and direct me
agent: clench your fists tightly and then release 3 times
consumer: I succeeded
agent: I had an internet problem So everything didn't move and now it's back. Sorry for the delay
agent: Well done to you. Now do the same clenching and unclenching of fists 5 times
consumer: I succeeded
Agent: Great. How do you feel now let's try breathing?
Consumer: Yes
agent: I'm really proud of you
agent: Even though it's hard for you, you don't give up
agent: So now please try to take air in through your nose and out slowly through your mouth
consumer: It's hard
agent: You're breathing hard
Consumer: Yes
agent: It's good that you tell me
agent: In a few minutes my shift will end and I want to ask you how you feel now
consumer: a little better
agent: Do you think you'll be able to sleep tonight, it seems your body needs rest
Consumer: No
agent: Do you have a pill you can take in such cases?
c onsumer: I haven't been able to sleep almost at all for a long time
consumer: I take
agent: When do you take it before bed or unrelated
consumer: I take it in the evening at 20
consumer: And if the situation is really bad, then there is also sos and I already took it two hours ago
agent: So at eight you already took 2 pills?
Consumer: Yes
agent: And don't you feel that it relaxes and tires you?
Consumer: No
agent: When do you meet with the doctor, maybe something needs to be adjusted in your medication
consumer: We met with him last week
agent: This was before the 2 difficult events you went through?
Consumer: Yes
agent: So maybe you need another meeting because now you are in an acute situation
consumer: The next turn is a long time away and I'm not sure I'm able to leave the house at all Soon
consumer: I can hardly get out of bed
agent: do you have a nanny?
Consumer: Yes
agent: And how do you feel about her?
consumer: I have been with her for almost 10 years
agent: Does she know that you are in an acute and difficult situation now?
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I don't think she knows how much but she knows about everything that happened
agent: When are you meeting with her this week?
consumer: We haven't decided yet
agent: I'm worried that you're in a broken state alone at home, maybe you should consult with her about what to do even over the phone
consumer: I can't call her now
agent: I meant tomorrow morning. Is it possible to call her?
consumer: I can try
agent: I think it's really worth it
agent: Is there a woman in the picture?
Consumer: No
co nsumer: I'm scared
agent: What are you afraid of?
consumer: from everything
consumer: It will stop at some point right? Will it hurt like this forever?
agent: You mean the pain from the abortion or the pain you feel because of the rape
consumer: both
agent: You are in a very complex situation for body and soul
agent: You went through 2 difficult things in a very short time difference, it's really a trauma for the body
consumer: will it feel like this forever?
agent: Ignore this is an automatic message because the shift is over but I'm here
agent: Everything is very fresh now, I believe that the body needs to recover and get stronger and feel better
agent: I feel you need some help. Someone who will come in and give you something to eat and drink. Is there someone you can contact?
consumer: I don't have anyone
agent: you are not Should you go to the hospital on Saturday?
consumer: I don't want to go to the hospital
agent: So you really have to be able to at least drink. Maybe try to rest for a few hours and then get up and drink something, even water with a little sugar
consumer: I'll try
agent: Would you like our coordinator to contact you tomorrow to ask how you are?
consumer: how will you contact
agent: Only if you agree will she call you
consumer: ok
agent: Can I call the mobile that appears here?
Consumer: Yes
agent: And what's your name?
consumer: colleague
agent: perfectly fine
agent: So we agree that you try to drink something in a little while and in the morning you call your nanny and update her on how you are doing and think together what you should do okay?
consumer: ok
agent: Thank you for sharing a And you. I send you an encouraging hug and hope that the night will pass in rest for body and soul and that you will be able to get stronger. If you need anything, there is a phone line at 1202 that is available 24 hours
consumer: Thank you for being with me
agent: From the bottom of my heart, dear. We are here, don't be alone, contact us when you need
consumer: Can I call even if I can't speak?
Agent: Yes. Just that they knew there was something on the line. Then you can do what suits you. There are people who are with us and are quiet.
consumer: ok
consumer: Thank you
